en: Reading for pleasure can better develop one’s imagination and language skills than watching TV can. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 为乐趣而阅读比看TV能更好地发展一个人的想象力和语言技能。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这种观点？

en: The most important thing of people's life is his or her work. Without a satisfying career, the life is meaningless. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 人们生活中最重要的是他或她的工作。没有令人满意的事业，生活是没有意义的。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这种观点？

en: Children spend long time studying in school and after school. What are the positive or negative effects on children and the society as a whole?
zh: 孩子们花很长时间在学校和放学后学习。对孩子和整个社会的正面或负面影响是什么？

en: Some people think watching TV every day is bad for children. Others think it is good for developing children as they grow up. Discuss both these views and give your own opinion.
zh: 有些人认为每天看TV对孩子不好。另一些人认为看电视对孩子的成长有好处。讨论这两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: Some people believe young people should be free to choose his or her job, but others think they should be realistic and think about their future. Discuss both views and give your opinion.
zh: 有些人认为年轻人应该自由选择自己的工作，但其他人认为他们应该现实一点，考虑一下自己的未来。讨论两种观点并给出你的观点。

en: Some people think all lawbreakers should be put into prison, others believe that there are better alternatives. Discuss these views and give your opinion.
zh: 一些人认为所有的违法者都应该被关进监狱，另一些人认为有更好的选择。讨论这些观点并给出你的观点。

en: Not enough students choose science subjects in university in many countries. What are the reasons? What are the effects on the society?
zh: 在许多国家，没有足够的学生在大学里选择理科。原因是什么？对社会的影响是什么？

en: More and more people tend to accept education through the internet, and therefore, face-to-face communication is decreasing. Do you think the advantages outweigh the disadvantages?
zh: 越来越多的人倾向于通过互联网接受教育，因此，面对面的交流正在减少。你认为利大于弊吗？

en: Some people believe that studying in a college or university is the best way for students to prepare for their future career. Others think they should leave school as soon as possible to develop their career through work experience. Discuss both these views and give your own opinion.
zh: 有些人认为在学院或大学学习是学生为未来的职业生涯做准备的最好方式。另一些人认为他们应该尽快离开学校，通过工作经验来发展自己的事业。讨论这两种观点，并给出你自己的观点。

en: It is more important for a building to focus on its function. Architects should not worry about its looks. Do you agree or disagree?
zh: 对于一个建筑来说，更重要的是关注它的功能。建筑师不应该担心它的外观。你同意还是不同意？

en: Scientific progress has greatly influenced our daily life. Do you think this is a positive or negative development?
zh: 科学进步极大地影响了我们的日常生活。你认为这是一个积极的还是消极的发展？

en: 100 years ago, the human race believed we would make continued progress in all areas of life. Today, some people feel less certain about this. In what areas has the human race made progress? In what other areas haven't we developed?
zh: 100年前，人类相信我们会在生活的各个领域取得持续的进步。今天，有些人对此感到不那么肯定了。人类在哪些领域取得了进步？还有哪些领域我们还没有取得进步？

en: As countries develop, their populations tend to live individually or in a small family unit. What are the reasons? What are the effects on society and family life?
zh: 随着国家的发展，他们的人口倾向于单独生活或以小家庭为单位。原因是什么？对社会和家庭生活有什么影响？

en: For older school children, some people think that these children should study a large number of subjects, but others believe that children should study less subjects but in details. Discuss both these views and give your own opinion.
zh: 对于学龄较大的孩子，一些人认为这些孩子应该学习大量的科目，但另一些人认为孩子应该学习较少的科目，但要详细。讨论这两种观点，并给出你自己的观点。

en: The quality of life in big cities is decreasing. What are the causes and what actions should be taken to solve this problem?
zh: 大城市的生活质量正在下降。原因是什么？应该采取什么措施来解决这个问题？

en: Advertising can influence the way people think, so it has negative effects. Do you agree or disagree?
zh: 广告可以影响人们的思维方式，所以它有负面影响。你是否同意？

en: Some people think learning history in school is important. Others think learning subjects more relevant to life is important. Discuss both these views and give your own opinion.
zh: 有些人认为在学校学习历史很重要。另一些人认为学习与生活更相关的科目很重要。讨论这两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: Some people think that the money government spend on art, such as music and painting, would be better spent on things more important. Do you agree or disagree?
zh: 一些人认为政府花在艺术上的钱，比如音乐和绘画，最好花在更重要的事情上。你同意还是不同意？

en: Some people think government should be responsible for providing financial support to old people after they retire, but others believe individuals should save money for themselves. Discuss both these views and give your own opinion.
zh: 一些人认为政府应该负责在老年人退休后为他们提供经济支持，但另一些人认为个人应该为自己存钱。讨论这两种观点，并给出你自己的观点。

en: Nowadays some countries encourage people to buy more and more products, which is good for economy, while others believe it is bad for the society. Discuss both these views and give your own opinion.
zh: 如今，一些国家鼓励人们购买越来越多的产品，这有利于经济发展，而另一些国家则认为这对社会有害。讨论这两种观点，并给出你的观点。

en: Some people think family has great influence on children's development. Others, however, believe that other things, such as media, have greater effects. Discuss both these views and give your own opinion.
zh: 一些人认为家庭对孩子的发展有很大的影响。然而，另一些人则认为其他因素，如媒体，有更大的影响。讨论这两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: Some people think secondary school should have a class of international news. Others believe it is not necessary. Discuss both views and give your opinion.
zh: 有些人认为中学应该开设国际新闻课。另一些人认为没有必要。讨论两种观点并给出你的观点。

en: Some people think space tourism can help to develop countries' economy. What's your opinion? What are the effects?
zh: 一些人认为太空旅游可以帮助发展国家的经济。你怎么看？效果如何？

en: The tendency for human beings to copy one another is shown in the popularity of fashion in clothes and other consumer goods. Do you agree or disagree?
zh: 人类相互模仿的趋势表现在服装和其他消费品的流行上。你同意还是不同意?

en: In modern society, it is possible to go shopping, work and communicate via the Internet without face-to-face contact with one another. To what extent do you think this is a positive or negative development?
zh: 在现代社会，人们可以通过互联网购物、工作和交流，而不需要面对面的接触。你认为这种发展在多大程度上是积极的还是消极的？

en: The restoration of old buildings in major cities in the world spends numerous government expenditures. This money should be used in new housing and road development. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 世界主要城市的旧建筑修复花费了大量的政府支出。这些钱应该用在新住房和道路建设上。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: In many countries today, people in cities either live alone or in small family units, rather than in large, extended family groups. Is this a positive or negative trend?
zh: 在今天的许多国家，城市里的人要么独居，要么以小家庭为单位，而不是以大家庭为单位。这是一个积极的还是消极的趋势?

en: In some countries, students pay their college or university fees, while in some others, government pays for them. Do you think the advantages that government pays the money outweigh the disadvantages?
zh: 在一些国家，学生支付他们的学院或大学费用，而在其他一些国家，政府支付他们。你认为政府支付学费的好处大于坏处吗？

en: Some people think that in modern society individuals are becoming more dependent on each other. But others say that individuals are becoming more independent on each other. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 一些人认为，在现代社会，个人变得越来越相互依赖。但也有人说，个人变得越来越相互独立。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: Some scientists think it is very soon that computers will be more intelligent than human. Some people think it is a positive development, while others think it is a negative development. Discuss both views and give your opinion.
zh: 一些科学家认为计算机很快就会比人类更聪明。一些人认为这是一个积极的发展，而另一些人则认为这是一个消极的发展。讨论两种观点并给出你的观点。

en: Nuclear energy is the best source of power in meeting ever-increasing energy needs. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 核能是满足日益增长的能源需求的最佳能源。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: Countries with a long average working time are more economically successful than those countries which do not have a long working time. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 平均工作时间长的国家比那些工作时间不长的国家在经济上更成功。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这种观点？

en: Throughout the history, people dream to build a perfect society while they haven't agreed how the ideal society would be like. What is the most important element you think to make a perfect society? How do people do to achieve an ideal society?
zh: 纵观历史，人们梦想建立一个完美的社会，但他们并没有同意理想的社会是什么样的。你认为建立一个完美社会最重要的因素是什么？人们如何实现一个理想的社会？

en: Some people think they have right to use as much fresh water as they want. Others otherwise believe governments should strictly control the use of fresh water as it is a limited resource. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 有些人认为他们有权随心所欲地使用淡水。其他人则认为政府应该严格控制淡水的使用，因为它是一种有限的资源。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: Some people think giving aid to poorer countries has more negative effects than positive ones. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 一些人认为向贫穷国家提供援助的负面影响大于积极影响。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: Economic progress is one way to measure a country's success. Other people think other factors are also important. What are the other factors? Which factor is the most important one?
zh: 经济进步是衡量一个国家成功的一种方式。其他人认为其他因素也很重要。其他因素是什么？哪个因素是最重要的？

en: Many parents these days work in other countries, taking their families with them. Do you think the advantages of the development outweigh its disadvantages?
zh: 现在很多父母带着家人在国外工作。你认为发展的利大于弊吗？

en: Some people think a rise in standard of living in a country only seems to benefit cities more than rural areas. What problems may those differences cause? How to reduce this problem?
zh: 一些人认为，一个国家生活水平的提高似乎只对城市比对农村地区更有利。这些差异可能会导致什么问题？如何减少这个问题？

en: Young people who commit serious crimes should be punished in the same way as adults. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 犯了严重罪行的年轻人应该像成年人一样受到惩罚。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: In the world, only a few languages are increasing in use, while many others are declining. Do you think this is a positive or negative development?
zh: 在世界上，只有少数语言的使用在增加，而其他许多语言的使用在减少。你认为这是一种积极还是消极的发展？

en: As part of education, students should spend a period of time studying and living in a different country to learn language and culture. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 作为教育的一部分，学生应该花一段时间在不同的国家学习和生活，学习语言和文化。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: People are buying more and more products from famous brands such as clothes, cars, and other items. What are the reasons for this? Do you think it's a positive or a negative development?
zh: 人们正在购买越来越多的名牌产品，如衣服、汽车和其他物品。造成这种情况的原因是什么？你认为这是一个积极的还是消极的发展？

en: In recent years, ‘responsible tourists’ have paid attention to preserving both culture and environment of the places they visit. However, some people say that it is impossible to be a responsible tourist. Do you agree or disagree?
zh: 近年来，“负责任的游客”已经注意到保护他们所参观的地方的文化和环境。然而，一些人说这是不可能成为一个负责任的游客。你同意还是不同意？

en: In many countries, more and more people buy a wide range of household goods like television, microwave oven and rice cooker. Do you think this is a positive or negative development?
zh: 在许多国家，越来越多的人购买各种各样的家庭用品，如电视机、微波炉和电饭煲。你认为这是一个积极的还是消极的发展？

en: Young people are leaving their homes from rural areas to study or work in the cities. What are the reasons? Do the advantages of this development outweigh its disadvantages?
zh: 年轻人离开家乡，从农村到城市学习或工作。原因是什么？这种发展的利大于弊吗？

en: Scientists advise people to lead a healthy lifestyle, but most people continue with unhealthy activities. Why? Solutions.
zh: 科学家建议人们过健康的生活方式，但大多数人继续从事不健康的活动。为什么?解决方案。

en: Some people think the best way to solve traffic congestion in cities is to provide free public transport 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 一些人认为解决城市交通拥堵的最好办法是每周7天，每天24小时提供免费的公共交通工具。你在多大程度上同意还是不同意？

en: Nowadays many young people in work force change their jobs or careers every few years. What do you think are the reasons for this? Do the advantages outweigh disadvantages?
zh: 如今，许多年轻人每隔几年就会更换工作或职业。你认为造成这种情况的原因是什么？利大于弊吗？

en: Many children find it is difficult to concentrate or pay attention at school. What are the causes? The possible solutions to this problem?
zh: 许多孩子发现在学校很难集中注意力。原因是什么？解决这个问题的可能方法是什么？

en: The international community should immediately reduce the consumption of fossil fuels of all countries. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 国际社会应立即减少所有国家的化石燃料消费。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: Some people believe the best way to produce a better society is to ensure there is only a small difference between the earnings of the richest and the poorest. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 有些人认为，创造一个更美好社会的最好方法是确保最富者和最贫穷者的收入之间只有很小的差距。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: Many people think the painting and music do not directly improve the quality of people, therefore the government should not spend the money in arts, and they should spend more money on construction of public facilities. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 许多人认为绘画和音乐不能直接提高人的素质，因此政府不应该把钱花在艺术上，而应该把更多的钱花在公共设施的建设上。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: Some people think success of life is based on hard work and determination but others think there are more important factors like money and appearance. Discuss both sides and give your own opinion?
zh: 有些人认为生活的成功是基于努力和决心，但另一些人认为有更重要的因素，如金钱和外表。讨论双方并给出你自己的观点？

en: Children’s education is expensive. In some countries, the government pay some of or all the costs. Do the advantages outweigh its disadvantages?
zh: 孩子的教育是昂贵的。在一些国家，政府支付部分或全部费用。利大于弊吗？

en: Some people think living in big cities is bad for people's health. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 一些人认为生活在大城市对人们的健康有害。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: Some people think young people should be required to have full time education until they are at least 18 years old. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 有些人认为年轻人应该被要求接受全日制教育，直到他们至少18岁。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: Many people believe that printed books are not good in this digital era, because computer can store more information, while others thinks printed books are still playing a significant role. Discuss both views and give your own ideas.
zh: 许多人认为纸质书在这个数字时代不好，因为电脑可以存储更多的信息，而另一些人则认为纸质书仍然发挥着重要作用。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: It is important for all towns and cities to have large public outdoor places like squares and parks. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 对于所有的城镇来说，拥有像广场和公园这样的大型公共户外场所是很重要的。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: An increasing number of people change their career and places of residence several times during life. Is this a positive or negative development?
zh: 越来越多的人一生中多次变换职业和居住地。这是一种积极的还是消极的发展？

en: Some say the purpose of education is to prepare individuals to be useful to society. Others say the purpose of education is to achieve personal ambitions. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 有人说，教育的目的是使个人成为对社会有用的人。另一些人说，教育的目的是实现个人抱负。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: Television advertisement aimed at children. What effects of this on children? Should TV advertisement be controlled?
zh: 针对儿童的电视广告。这对孩子有什么影响？电视广告应该被控制吗？

en: Computer technologies are more accessible and cheaper, as the result, more adults work at home and children study at home. Is this a positive or negative development?
zh: 计算机技术更容易获得，也更便宜，因此，更多的成年人在家工作，孩子们在家学习。这是一种积极的还是消极的发展？

en: Nowadays, women have full-time work same as men, logically men should share household equally with women. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 如今，女性和男性一样有全职工作，从逻辑上讲，男性应该和女性平等分担家务。你在多大程度上同意还是不同意？

en: Employers should give their staff at least a 4-week holiday a year to make employees better at their jobs. To what extend do you agree or disagree?
zh: 雇主应该每年给员工至少4周的假期，让员工更好地完成工作。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: Children can learn effectively from watching television. Therefore, children should be encouraged to watch television regularly both at home and at school. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 孩子们可以通过看电视有效地学习。因此，无论是在家里还是在学校，都应该鼓励孩子们定期看电视。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: Many young people leave school with a negative attitude. What are the reasons? How can we encourage young people to study?
zh: 许多年轻人带着消极的态度离开学校。原因是什么？我们如何鼓励年轻人学习？

en: Some people think that if a police force carries a gun, it can lead to higher level of crime in that society. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 有些人认为，如果警察携带枪支，可能会导致该社会的犯罪率上升。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: Some people think adults should learn practical skills by themselves, while others believe that learning from a teacher in a classroom is better. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 有些人认为成年人应该自己学习实用技能，而另一些人则认为在课堂上向老师学习更好。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: An increasing number of people are changing their careers. What are the reasons? Do you think it is positive or negative?
zh: 越来越多的人正在改变他们的职业。原因是什么？你认为这是积极的还是消极的？

en: With the increasing demand for energy sources of oil and gas, people should look for sources of oil and gas in remote and untouched natural places. Do the advantages outweigh disadvantages of damaging such areas?
zh: 随着对石油和天然气能源需求的不断增加，人们应该在偏远和未被触及的自然环境中寻找石油和天然气的来源。破坏这些地区的利大于弊吗？

en: Some countries achieve international success,building specialized sports facilities for top athletes to train instead of providing sports facilities that everyone can use. Positive or negative?
zh: 一些国家在国际上取得了成功，他们为顶尖运动员建造专门的体育设施进行训练，而不是提供人人都能使用的体育设施。是正面还是负面？

en: Some people think younger people are not suitable for important positions in government in countries. Some think it will be a good idea for younger people to take on these positions. Agree or disagree?
zh: 有些人认为年轻人不适合在国家政府中担任重要职位。有些人认为让年轻人担任这些职位是个好主意。同意还是不同意？

en: Some people believe that the government have the duty to ensure its citizens have a healthy diet, while others believe it is individuals' responsibility to care for their diet and health? Discuss both sides and give your opinion?
zh: 有些人认为政府有责任确保其公民有健康的饮食，而另一些人则认为个人有责任照顾他们的饮食和健康。讨论双方并给出你的观点？

en: Some people think that environmental problems are too big for individuals to solve. Others, however, believe that the problems cannot be solved if individuals do not take actions. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 有些人认为环境问题太大，个人无法解决。然而，另一些人认为，如果个人不采取行动，这些问题就无法解决。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: Children are committing more crimes. What are the causes? How to punish them?
zh: 儿童犯罪越来越多。原因是什么？如何惩罚？

en: Some people think that dangerous sports should be banned, but others think the people should have freedom to choose sports activities. Discuss both views and give your opinion.
zh: 有些人认为危险的运动应该被禁止，但其他人认为人们应该有自由选择体育活动。讨论两种观点并给出你的观点。

en: Governments are encouraging industries and businesses to move from large cities to regional areas. Do the advantages outweigh the disadvantages?
zh: 政府正在鼓励工业和企业从大城市迁往边远地区。利大于弊吗？

en: To what extent do you think societies benefit from the contact and closer relationship with foreigners brought about by international business and tourism?
zh: 你认为社会在多大程度上受益于国际商务和旅游业带来的与外国人的接触和更密切的关系？

en: With major cities continue growing, are there any problems to young people? How to solve these problems?
zh: 随着大城市的不断发展，对年轻人有什么问题吗？如何解决这些问题？

en: In developing countries, some people think the government should introduce new technology to people in order to improve quality of life, while others believe governments should offer free education. Discuss both sides and give your own opinion.
zh: 在发展中国家，一些人认为政府应该向人们引进新技术以提高生活质量，而另一些人则认为政府应该提供免费教育。讨论双方的观点并给出你的观点。

en: Recently years, more and more people choose to live by themselves, why? Is it positive or negative for the development of the society?
zh: 近年来，越来越多的人选择独自生活，为什么？这对社会的发展是积极的还是消极的？

en: It is not necessary to travel to other places to learn about the other culture. we can learn as much as from books, films and internet. To what extent of you agree or disagree?
zh: 没有必要到其他地方去学习其他文化。我们可以从书本、电影和网络中学到同样多的东西。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: Some people say job satisfaction is more important than job security, other think people cannot always expect enjoy in jobs, working permanently is more important. Discuss both views and give your opinion.
zh: 有些人说工作满意度比工作保障更重要，另一些人认为人们不能总是期望在工作中享受，永久工作更重要。讨论两种观点并给出你的观点。

en: It is better for people to be unemployed than people to be employed but they do not enjoy. Do you agree or disagree?
zh: 人们失业总比有工作却不喜欢的人好。你同意还是不同意？

en: Some think most crime is the result of circumstances e.g. poverty and other social problems. Others believe that most crime is caused by people who are bad by nature. Discuss both sides and give your own opinion.
zh: 有些人认为大多数犯罪是环境的结果，例如贫穷和其他社会问题。另一些人则认为大多数犯罪是由本性恶劣的人造成的。讨论双方的观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: Researchers show that overeating is as harmful as smoking. Therefore, advertising for food products should be banned in the same way as the cigarette, advertising is banned in many countries. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 研究人员表明，暴饮暴食和吸烟一样有害。因此，食品广告应该像禁止香烟一样被禁止，在许多国家广告是被禁止的。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: Online shopping is now replacing shopping in store. Do you think it is positive or negative development?
zh: 网上购物正在取代实体店购物。你认为这是积极的还是消极的发展？

en: Some people think language class should be taught in small class, others think the number of students doesn't matter. Do you agree or disagree?
zh: 一些人认为语言课应该小班授课，另一些人认为学生的数量并不重要。你同意还是不同意？

en: Some think “Vertical City” is the best where people live and work in tall buildings. Others think“ Horizontal City” is better where there are few tall buildings. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 有人认为“垂直城市”是最好的，人们在高层建筑中生活和工作。另一些人认为“水平城市”最好是在高楼很少的地方。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: Shops should not be allowed to sell any food and drinks which are proved to be scientifically harmful for people's health. Do you agree or disagree?
zh: 商店不应该被允许出售任何被科学证明对人们健康有害的食品和饮料。你同意还是不同意？

en: Some people think painting and drawings are as important as other subjects, they should be compulsory in high school education. What do you think?
zh: 有些人认为绘画和素描和其他科目一样重要，它们应该是高中教育的必修课。你怎么看？

en: The leaders or directors of organizations are often older people. But some people say that young people can also be a leader. What do you think?
zh: 组织的领导或董事往往是老年人。但是有些人说年轻人也可以成为领导者。你怎么看？

en: Some people think that the amount of noise people make have to be controlled strictly, others say that people are free to make as much as they wish. Discuss both sides and give your opinion.
zh: 有些人认为人们制造的噪音必须严格控制，另一些人说人们可以自由地制造他们想要的噪音。讨论双方并给出你的意见。

en: Nowadays both scientists and tourists can go to remote natural environments such as the South Pole. Do you think the advantages of this development outweigh the disadvantages?
zh: 现在，科学家和游客都可以去遥远的自然环境，如南极。你认为这种发展的利大于弊吗？

en: Some people argue that too much attention and too many resources are given to the protection of wild animals and birds. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 一些人认为我们对野生动物和鸟类的保护给予了太多的关注和资源。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: Many museums and historical sites are mainly visited by tourists, not local people. Why is this the case and what can be done to attract local people.
zh: 许多博物馆和历史遗迹主要是游客参观的，而不是当地人。为什么会出现这种情况，又可以做些什么来吸引当地人。

en: Some people think that the best way to improve road safety is to increase the minimum legal age for driving cars and motorcycles. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 一些人认为提高道路安全的最好方法是提高驾驶汽车和摩托车的最低法定年龄。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: The use of mobile phone in certain places is just as antisocial as smoking. do you think mobile should be banned like smoking?
zh: 在某些地方使用手机和吸烟一样是反社会的。你认为手机应该像吸烟一样被禁止吗？

en: Some students take one year off between finishing school and going to university, in order to travel or to work. Do you think advantages outweigh disadvantages?
zh: 有些学生在完成学业和上大学之间休息一年，以便旅行或工作。你认为利大于弊吗？

en: Some people think that it is more important to plant more trees in open area which in towns and cities than build more housing. To what extend do agree or disagree?
zh: 一些人认为在城镇的空地上种更多的树比建造更多的房子更重要。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: Some working parents believe childcare centers can provide best care for their children, while others think of other family members like grandparents can do this job. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 一些有工作的父母认为托儿中心可以为他们的孩子提供最好的照顾，而另一些人则认为其他家庭成员，比如祖父母可以做这项工作。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: Some people believe famous people's support towards international aid organizations draws the attention to problems, while others think celebrities make the problems less important. Discuss both views and give your opinion.
zh: 一些人认为名人对国际援助组织的支持引起了人们对问题的关注，而另一些人则认为名人使问题变得不那么重要。讨论两种观点并给出你的观点。

en: Some people believe that the increasing use of the computers and the mobile phones has a negative effect on young people’s reading and writing skill, do you agree or disagree?
zh: 一些人认为越来越多的使用电脑和手机对年轻人的阅读和写作能力有负面影响，你同意还是不同意？

en: Nowadays, older people who need employment have to compete with younger people. What problems do this cause? And what are the solutions?
zh: 现在，需要就业的老年人不得不和年轻人竞争。这造成了什么问题？解决办法是什么？

en: Some people think only best students should be rewarded, others think we should reward students who make progress.
zh: 一些人认为只有最好的学生才应该得到奖励，另一些人认为我们应该奖励那些取得进步的学生。

en: Young people who commit crimes should be treated in the same way as adults by authorities. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 当局应该像对待成年人一样对待犯罪的年轻人。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: In some countries, more and more adults are continuing to live with their parents even after they have completed education and found jobs. Do the advantages outweigh the disadvantages?
zh: 在一些国家，越来越多的成年人即使在完成学业并找到工作后仍然继续和父母住在一起。利大于弊吗？

en: Developments of technology are causing environmental problems. Some people think the solution is that everyone accepts a simpler life, while others believe that technology can solve these problems. Discuss both views and give your opinion.
zh: 科技的发展正在引起环境问题。一些人认为解决办法是每个人都接受更简单的生活，而另一些人则认为技术可以解决这些问题。讨论两种观点并给出你的观点。

en: To improve the quality of education, people think that we should encourage our students to evaluate and criticize their teachers. Others believe that it will result in a loss of respect and discipline in the classroom. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 为了提高教育质量，人们认为我们应该鼓励学生评价和批评他们的老师。另一些人则认为这会导致课堂上缺乏尊重和纪律。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: In some countries around the world men and women are having children late in life. What are the reasons for this development? What are the effects on society and family life?
zh: 在世界上的一些国家，男人和女人都很晚才生孩子。这种发展的原因是什么？对社会和家庭生活有什么影响？

en: In some countries, people believe that international tourism is a bad thing for their country. What are the reasons for this? How to change their views?
zh: 在一些国家，人们认为国际旅游对他们的国家有害。这种看法的原因是什么？如何改变他们的看法？

en: Some people prefer to provide help and support directly to those in their local community who need it. Others, however prefer to give money to national and international charitable organizations. Discuss both views and give your opinion.
zh: 有些人更喜欢直接向当地社区中需要帮助的人提供帮助和支持。然而，其他人更喜欢把钱捐给国内和国际慈善组织。讨论两种观点并给出你的观点。

en: As the transportation and accommodation problem increases in big cities, some governments are encouraging business move from the city to the rural area, do you think the advantages outweigh the disadvantages?
zh: 随着大城市交通和住宿问题的日益严重，一些政府正在鼓励企业从城市向农村转移，你认为利大于弊吗？

en: In some countries, a high proportion of criminal acts are committed by teenagers. Why has this happened? What can be done to deal with this?
zh: 在一些国家，青少年犯下的犯罪行为比例很高。为什么会发生这种情况？可以做些什么来解决这个问题？

en: Many people do not feel safe either at home or they are out. What are the causes, and what can be done to make people feel safer?
zh: 很多人无论是在家还是外出都感到不安全。原因是什么？怎样做才能让人们感到更安全？

en: It is suggested that all the young adults should undertake a period of unpaid work helping people in the community. Does it bring more benefits or drawbacks to the community and the young people?
zh: 有人建议所有的年轻人都应该从事一段时间的无偿工作，帮助社区里的人。它给社区和年轻人带来更多的好处还是坏处？

en: Advertising discourages us from being different individuals by making them want to be or to look the same. Do you agree or disagree?
zh: 广告通过让我们想要成为或看起来一样来阻止我们成为不同的个体。你同意还是不同意？

en: Some people say government should give the health care the first priorities , some others believe there are more important priorities to spend the tax payers' money. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 一些人说政府应该把医疗保健放在第一位，另一些人认为花纳税人的钱有更重要的优先事项。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: As well as making money, businesses should also have social responsibilities. Do you agree or disagree?
zh: 除了赚钱，企业也应该有社会责任。同意还是不同意？

en: The natural resources such as oil, forests and fresh water are being consumed at an alarming rate. What problems does it cause? How can we solve these problems?
zh: 像石油、森林和淡水这样的自然资源正以惊人的速度被消耗。它造成了什么问题？我们如何解决这些问题？

en: Some people who have been in prison become good citizens later. Some people think that they are the best people to talk to school students about the danger of committing a crime. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 有些坐过牢的人后来成了好公民。有些人认为他们是向学生讲述犯罪危险的最佳人选。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: International travel sometimes lead people have some prejudices rather than broad minds. Why? How to improve the understanding of countries they visit?
zh: 国际旅行有时会导致人们产生一些偏见，而不是开阔的视野。为什么?如何增进对访问国家的了解？

en: Some people regard the increasing business and cultural contact between countries as a positive development. Others, however, feel these leading to loss of national identities. Discuss both views and give your opinion.
zh: 一些人认为国与国之间日益增多的商业和文化交流是一种积极的发展。然而，另一些人则认为这会导致民族认同的丧失。讨论两种观点并给出你的观点。

en: Many people are afraid to leave their homes because of their fear of crimes. Some people believe that more actions should be taken to prevent crime, but others feel that little can be done. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 许多人因为害怕犯罪而不敢离开家。一些人认为应该采取更多的措施来防止犯罪，但另一些人则认为无能为力。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: Students in school or university learn more from classes of teachers than other resources (e.g. Internet or TV), do you agree or disagree?
zh: 学生在学校或大学里从老师的课堂上学到的比其他资源（如网络或电视）更多，你同意还是不同意？

en: Some people think everyone should be a vegetarian because we do not need to eat meat to have a healthy diet. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 有些人认为每个人都应该成为素食主义者，因为我们不需要吃肉来保持健康的饮食。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: In some countries there is not enough recycling of waste materials (e.g. Paper, glass and cans.) What are the reasons and solutions?
zh: 在一些国家，没有足够的废物回收（如纸、玻璃和罐头）。原因和解决办法是什么？

en: In some countries, secondary school aims to provide a general education across a range of subjects. In others, children focus on a narrow range of subjects related to a particular career. Which do you think is appropriate in today’s world?
zh: 在一些国家，中学旨在提供一系列学科的通识教育。在另一些国家，孩子们专注于与特定职业相关的狭窄科目。你认为在当今世界，哪一种是合适的？

en: Some people think governments should focus on reducing environmental pollution and housing problems to help people prevent illness and disease. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 一些人认为政府应该把重点放在减少环境污染和住房问题上，以帮助人们预防疾病。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: Some people say that playing computer games is bad for children in every aspect. Others say that playing computer games can have positive effects on the way children develop. Discuss both views and give your opinion.
zh: 有些人说玩电脑游戏在各个方面对孩子都不好。另一些人说玩电脑游戏对孩子的成长有积极的影响。讨论两种观点并给出你的观点。

en: Some people think people working in creative arts should be financially supported by government. Others think they should find financial support from other resources. Discuss both sides and give your opinion.
zh: 一些人认为从事创意艺术工作的人应该得到政府的财政支持。其他人认为他们应该从其他资源中寻求经济支持。讨论双方并给出你的观点。

en: School leavers go travelling or work before they go directly to university. Are there more advantages or disadvantages on their study?
zh: 中学毕业生在直接进入大学之前会去旅行或工作。他们的学习有更多的优点还是缺点？

en: For school children, their teachers have more influence on their intelligence and social development than parents. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 对于学龄儿童来说，他们的老师比父母对他们的智力和社会发展有更大的影响。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: The best way to teach children to cooperate is through team sports at school. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 教育孩子合作的最好方法是通过学校的团队运动。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: Consumption of the world’s resources (such as oil, fresh water, etc.) is increasing at a dangerous rate. What are the causes of this increased consumption? What can people do to reduce it?
zh: 世界资源（如石油、淡水等）的消耗正以危险的速度增长。造成这种消费增加的原因是什么？人们可以做些什么来减少消费？

en: The government should spend money in promoting sport and art in school, rather than sponsoring professional sports and art events in communities. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 政府应该花钱在学校推广体育和艺术，而不是在社区赞助专业的体育和艺术活动。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: Nowadays, more and more jobs and tasks are done by machines which involve hard physical work. Do these effects of this trend outweigh the negative effects?
zh: 如今，越来越多的工作和任务是由机器完成的，这些工作和任务涉及繁重的体力劳动。这种趋势的利大于弊吗？

en: In some countries, the role of a mother differs in some ways from the role of a father. Why do you think these differences exist? How might parental roles develop in the future?
zh: 在一些国家，母亲的角色在某些方面与父亲的角色不同。你认为为什么会存在这些差异？未来父母的角色会如何发展？

en: Nowadays, most people learn academic study in university, but others think we should encourage to learn vocational skills more, do you agree or disagree?
zh: 如今，大多数人在大学学习学术研究，但其他人认为我们应该鼓励更多地学习职业技能，你同意还是不同意？

en: Interview is the basic form of selecting procedure for most large companies. Some people think it is unreliable. There are some other better methods. Do you agree or disagree?
zh: 面试是大多数大公司选择程序的基本形式。有些人认为它不可靠。还有一些其他更好的方法。你是否同意？

en: People are surrounded by many kinds of advertising which can influence their life. Does the positive effect of this trend outweigh negative effects?
zh: 人们被各种各样的广告所包围，这些广告会影响他们的生活。这种趋势的正面影响大于负面影响吗？

en: Some people think reading stories in book is better than watching TV or playing computer games for children. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 有些人认为读书中的故事比看TV或玩电脑游戏对孩子更好。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: Some people think that cultural traditions will be destroyed when they are used as money-making machines aims at tourists, other people believe that it is the only way to save such conditions in the world today. Discuss both sides and give your own opinion.
zh: 一些人认为，当文化传统被用作针对游客的赚钱机器时，它们将被破坏，另一些人认为这是拯救当今世界这种状况的唯一方法。讨论双方的观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: Difference between countries are becoming less evident recently. People can see the same films, brands, fashion, advertisements and TV channels. To what extent do disadvantage outweigh advantages?
zh: 国与国之间的差异最近变得不那么明显了。人们可以看到相同的电影、品牌、时尚、广告和TV频道。劣势在多大程度上大于优势？

en: Some people think government should invest more money in teaching science than other subjects for a country to develop and progress. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 一些人认为为了国家的发展和进步，政府应该在科学教育上投入比其他学科更多的钱。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: Recent newspaper article reports that a 14-year-old boy who seriously destroyed his school got a punishment to clean streets instead of sent to the prison. Do you think this is right, or the young criminals should be sent to the jail?
zh: 最近报纸上的一篇文章报道说，一个14岁的男孩严重毁坏了他的学校，他没有被送进监狱，而是被罚去打扫街道。你认为这是对的，还是应该把这些年轻的罪犯送进监狱？

en: News media has become more influential in people’s lives. Others believe it is a negative development. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 新闻媒体对人们生活的影响越来越大。其他人则认为这是一个负面的发展。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: In some countries, the government has tried to reduce traffic. For instance, they imposed a congestion tax during rush hour. Do you think this development is positive or negative?
zh: 在一些国家，政府试图减少交通流量。例如，他们在高峰时间征收交通拥堵税。你认为这种发展是积极的还是消极的？

en: In some countries, there has been an increase number of parents who educated their children themselves at home instead of sending them to school. Do you think the advantages of this outweigh the disadvantages?
zh: 在一些国家，越来越多的父母自己在家教育孩子，而不是把他们送到学校去。你认为这样做的利大于弊吗？

views.claim_zh:
反方观点
但居家教育的劣势也很突出：孩子缺少高频同龄互动，社交能力练习不足，未来进入集体环境更难适应。
views.claim_en: However, a major disadvantage is that homeschooling reduces frequent peer interaction, limiting social practice and making later adjustment to group settings harder.
views.analysis_zh:
起点A：同龄互动频率下降
→ 少了每天的合作、冲突与和解（分工、轮流、妥协）
→ 社交规则只能“知道”，但缺少反复实战
→ 终点：团队协作与人际边界感发展更慢

起点B：进入新环境时“强度陡增”
→ 从家庭小圈子突然切换到学校/大学/职场的大集体
→ 需要同时处理任务与复杂人际
→ 适应期更长、容易退缩
→ 终点：影响融入与表现
views.analysis_en:
Start A: Fewer daily peer interactions
→ fewer chances to practise sharing, turn-taking, negotiation and conflict resolution
→ social rules are understood in theory but not trained repeatedly
→ End: slower development of teamwork and interpersonal boundaries

Start B: A sharp transition later
→ moving from a small family setting to a large school/university/workplace
→ managing tasks plus complex social dynamics at the same time
→ longer adjustment period and possible withdrawal
→ End: weaker integration and performance

en: Human activities have negative effects on plant and animal species. Some people think it is too late to do anything about this problem. Others believe that effective measures can be taken to improve this situation. Discuss both views and give your opinion.
zh: 人类活动对动植物物种有负面影响。一些人认为现在对这个问题做任何事情都太晚了。另一些人认为可以采取有效的措施来改善这种状况。讨论两种观点并给出你的观点。

en: Nowadays a large amount of advertising aiming at children should be banned because of the negative effects. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 现在大量针对儿童的广告应该被禁止，因为有负面影响。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: In many countries women are allowed to take maternity leave from their jobs during the first month after the birth of their baby. Does advantage outweigh disadvantages?
zh: 在许多国家，妇女在孩子出生后的第一个月内可以休产假。利大于弊吗？

en: We can get knowledge from news. But some people even think we should not trust the journalists. What do you think? And what do you think are the important qualities that a journalist should have?
zh: 我们可以从新闻中获得知识。但是有些人甚至认为我们不应该相信记者。你怎么看？你认为记者应该具备的重要素质是什么？

en: In modern life, it is no longer necessary to use animals as food and in other products like clothing and medicines. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 在现代生活中，不再需要将动物用作食物和其他产品，如服装和药品。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: Some people think health care should be free for everyone, while others think they should pay medical costs for themselves. Discuss both sides and give your own opinion.
zh: 有些人认为医疗保健应该对所有人免费，而另一些人则认为他们应该为自己支付医疗费用。讨论双方并给出你自己的观点。

en: Today many children spend a lot of time playing computer games and little time on sports. Why is it? Is it a positive or negative development?
zh: 现在很多孩子花很多时间玩电脑游戏，很少有时间做运动。为什么呢？这是一个积极的还是消极的发展？

en: Multicultural societies, where people of different groups live together, can bring more benefits than drawbacks to a country. To what extent do you agree and disagree?
zh: 多元文化社会，不同群体的人生活在一起，给一个国家带来的好处大于坏处。你在多大程度上同意和不同意这个观点？

en: When new towns are planned, it is important to build more public parks or sports facilities than shopping centers for people to spend their free time. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 在规划新城镇时，重要的是要建造更多的公园或体育设施，而不是购物中心，让人们度过他们的空闲时间。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: The increase in the production of consumer goods results in damage to the natural environment. What are the causes of this? What can be done to solve this problem?
zh: 消费品生产的增加导致了对自然环境的破坏。造成这种情况的原因是什么？如何解决这个问题？

en: People’s shopping habits depend more on the age group they belong to than any other factor. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 人们的购物习惯更多地取决于他们所属的年龄组，而不是其他因素。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: Some people think teaching children different abilities together benefits everyone, others think intelligent children should be taught separately and given special treatment. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 一些人认为把不同能力的孩子放在一起教对每个人都有好处，另一些人认为聪明的孩子应该分开教，并给予特殊对待。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: Some people believe countries have moral obligation to help each other, other worry about the aid money cannot get to the poor of this world. Discuss both sides and give your own opinion.
zh: 一些人认为国家有相互帮助的道德义务，另一些人担心援助资金无法到达这个世界上的穷人手中。讨论双方并给出你自己的观点。

en: New parents should attend a parenting course to learn how to bring up their children well. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 新父母应该参加一个育儿课程，学习如何抚养好他们的孩子。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: Many students are taught to push themselves to try and be better than other students, rather than work together for everyone’s benefits. Do the advantages outweigh the disadvantages?
zh: 许多学生被教导要强迫自己努力，比其他学生做得更好，而不是为了每个人的利益而共同努力。利大于弊吗？

en: Some people believe that the country would benefit a lot from a large number of young people entering into university; however, others think that the large amount of people receiving the education of university only leads to graduate unemployment. Discuss both views and give your opinion.
zh: 一些人认为国家会从大量的年轻人进入大学中获益良多；然而，另一些人认为大量的人接受大学教育只会导致毕业生失业。讨论两种观点并给出你的观点。

en: Some people think schools should teach students to form good behavior in addition to providing formal education. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 一些人认为学校除了提供正规教育外，还应该教会学生养成良好的行为习惯。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: The range and quality of food has been improved with the development of technology and scientific advance. Some people think it is good and others think it is harmful. Discuss two sides and give your opinion.
zh: 随着科技的发展和科学的进步，食品的种类和质量都得到了提高。一些人认为它是好的，另一些人认为它是有害的。讨论双方并给出你的观点。

en: There are many advertisements directed at children, such as snacks, toys and other goods. Parents argue that children are under pressure. Advertisers claim that the advertisements provide useful information. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 有许多针对儿童的广告，如零食、玩具和其他商品。家长们认为孩子们有压力。广告商声称广告提供了有用的信息。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: People still value artists in the age of advanced science and technology. Why you think this is? Are arts as important as science and technology?
zh: 在科学技术发达的时代，人们仍然重视艺术家。为什么会这样认为呢？艺术和科学技术一样重要吗？

en: Some people think that instead of preventing climate change, we need to find a way to live with it. Do you agree or disagree?
zh: 有人认为，与其阻止气候变化，我们更需要找到一种与之共存的方式。你同意还是不同意？

en: Some people think that the government should decide which subject students study at university, while others think that students should be allowed to apply for the subject they prefer. Discuss two views and give your opinion.
zh: 一些人认为政府应该决定学生在大学学习什么科目，而另一些人认为学生应该被允许申请他们喜欢的科目。讨论两种观点并给出你的观点。

views.claim_zh:
XY
政府决定的好处：更具有系统性学习，简单到难，夯实学生基础
学生自选的好处：有兴趣，更有动力
政府更合适。

en: Some people think that it is necessary to travel abroad to learn about other countries. However, other people think that it is not necessary to travel abroad because all the information can be seen at TV and the Internet. Discuss both opinions and give your own opinion.
zh: 一些人认为出国旅行以了解其他国家是必要的。然而，其他人认为没有必要出国旅行，因为所有的信息都可以在TV和互联网上看到。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: In many countries, people can eat a wide variety of food today. As a result, they eat food from other regions than local foods. Do you think the advantages of the development outweigh disadvantages?
zh: 在许多国家，人们今天可以吃各种各样的食物。因此，他们吃来自其他地区的食物，而不是本地食物。你认为发展的利大于弊吗？

en: Some people think charity organizations should help people in great need wherever they live. However, others think they should help people in their own country. Discuss both opinions and give your own opinion.
zh: 有些人认为慈善组织应该帮助有需要的人，无论他们住在哪里。然而，其他人认为他们应该帮助自己国家的人。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: Some people think it is more important to plant trees in open areas in towns and cities than to provide more housing. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 一些人认为在城镇的开阔地带种植树木比提供更多的住房更重要。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: Some people think having more TV channels is good because they will have more choices, while others think it is not good because programs’ quality is lower. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 有些人认为有更多的TV是好事，因为他们将有更多的选择，而另一些人认为这不是好事，因为节目的质量较低。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: Many customs and the traditional ways of behavior are no longer relevant to the modern life and no worth keeping. Do you agree or disagree?
zh: 许多习俗和传统的行为方式与现代生活不再相关，不值得保留。你同意还是不同意？

en: More and more people buy and use their own car. Do you think the advantages of this trend for individuals outweigh the disadvantages for the environment?
zh: 越来越多的人购买和使用自己的车。你认为这种趋势对个人来说利大于弊吗？

en: In many cities an increasing number of people do not know their neighbors and they lack a sense of community. What are the cause? How to solve this problem?
zh: 在许多城市，越来越多的人不认识他们的邻居，他们缺乏社区意识。这是什么原因呢？如何解决这个问题？

en: Maintaining public libraries is a waste of time since computer technology is now replacing their functions. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 维护公共图书馆是浪费时间，因为计算机技术正在取代它们的功能。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: Some scientists believe intelligent life forms may exist in other planets and some want to send messages to the space to contact with these life forms. But other scientists believe it is a bad idea and it could be dangerous. Discuss both ideas and give your own opinion.
zh: 一些科学家认为智能生命形式可能存在于其他行星上，一些科学家想要向太空发送信息与这些生命形式接触。但其他科学家认为这是一个坏主意，可能会很危险。讨论这两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: In some countries, the criminal trials are shown on the TV and the general public can watch them. Do the advantages outweigh the disadvantages?
zh: 在一些国家，刑事审判在电视上播出，公众可以观看。利大于弊吗？

en: It is a good thing for people in senior management positions to get a higher salary than other workers in the same company. To what extent do you agree or disagree
zh: 处于高级管理职位的人比同一公司的其他员工获得更高的薪水是一件好事。你在多大程度上同意或不同意

en: It is a good thing for people in senior management positions to get a higher salary than other workers in the same company. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 处于高级管理职位的人比同一公司的其他工人获得更高的薪水是一件好事。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: Some people think individuals are more and more dependent on each other. Some people think individuals are more and more independent. Discuss both views and give your opinion.
zh: 有些人认为个人越来越依赖彼此。有些人认为个人越来越独立。讨论两种观点并给出你的观点。

en: In some countries, more people choose to live by themselves in recent years, why is it case? Is it a positive or negative development for society?
zh: 在一些国家，近年来越来越多的人选择自己生活，为什么会这样？这对社会的发展是积极的还是消极的？

en: People believe that using mobile phones and computers to communicate. Therefore, people are losing the ability to communicate with each other face to face. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 人们认为使用手机和电脑进行交流。因此，人们正在失去面对面交流的能力。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: Some countries achieve international sporting success by building specialized facilities to train top athletes instead of providing sports facilities that everyone can use. Do you think it is a positive or negative development?
zh: 一些国家通过建造专门的设施来训练顶级运动员，而不是提供每个人都可以使用的体育设施，从而取得了国际体育上的成功。你认为这是一个积极的还是消极的发展？

en: Some people think they have the right to use as much fresh water as they want, while others believe governments should tightly control the use of fresh water as it is a limited resource. Discuss both views and give your opinion.
zh: 有些人认为他们有权随心所欲地使用淡水，而另一些人则认为政府应该严格控制淡水的使用，因为它是一种有限的资源。讨论两种观点并给出你的观点。

en: Some people think international cooperation has brought benefits to world environment protection, while some people think more benefits have been brought to international business. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 有些人认为国际合作给世界环境保护带来了好处，而有些人认为国际贸易带来了更多的好处。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: Some people think getting old is entirely bad, but other people do think it’s much better for old people to live now than in the past. Please show your idea with explanation, examples and your knowledge.
zh: 有些人认为变老是完全不好的，但其他人确实认为老年人现在生活比过去好得多。请用解释，例子和你的知识来展示你的想法。

en: Art classes like painting and drawing is important to students’ development and it should be compulsory in high school. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 像绘画和素描这样的艺术课对学生的发展很重要，应该是高中的必修课。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: On vehicle-free day, private cars, trucks and motorcycles are banned in the city centre while the public transport is permitted such as bicycles, buses and taxis. Do the benefits of the vehicle-free day outweigh the disadvantages?
zh: 在无车日，私家车，卡车和摩托车禁止在市中心，而公共交通工具，如自行车，公共汽车和出租车是允许的。无车日利大于弊吗？

views.claim_zh: 缓解交通压力
人们意识到在非无车日也会选择公共交通

en: Someone says that job satisfaction is more important than job security, but others disagree. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 有人说工作满意度比工作稳定性更重要，但也有人不同意。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: Some people think the best way to solve traffic congestion in cities is to provide free public transport 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 一些人认为解决城市交通拥堵的最好办法是每周7天，每天24小时提供免费的公共交通工具。你在多大程度上同意还是不同意？

en: In modern society, ambition is more and more important. How important is ambition for being successful in life? Is it a positive or negative characteristic?
zh: 在现代社会，野心越来越重要。野心对于人生的成功有多重要？它是一个积极的还是消极的特征？

en: Some people believe that the best city is a ‘vertical’ city where people work and suited in tall buildings. Some people believe a ‘horizontal’ city is a better city where there are fewer tall buildings. Discuss Both there views and give your own opinion.
zh: 有些人认为，最好的城市是“垂直”城市，人们在那里工作，适合在高层建筑中工作。有些人认为“水平”的城市更好，因为那里的高楼更少。讨论这两种观点，并给出你自己的观点。

en: Some people believe that developments of technology are making life too complex, and that the solution for everyone is to accept a simpler way of life without using that technology. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 一些人认为科技的发展使生活变得太复杂了，每个人的解决方案是接受一种不使用科技的更简单的生活方式。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: Some people want the government to spend money on looking for other life on other planets, but others think that it is a wastes of public money, because there are many problems need to be solved on the Earth. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 有些人希望政府花钱在其他星球上寻找其他生命，但另一些人认为这是浪费公共资金，因为地球上有许多问题需要解决。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: Many people today leave school with a negative attitude towards learning. Why? What can be done to encourage a positive attitude to learning in young people?
zh: 今天许多人带着消极的学习态度离开学校。为什么?我们可以做些什么来鼓励年轻人积极的学习态度？

en: Some people think that children can learn efficiently by watching television. Therefore, children should be encouraged to watch TV regularly both at school and at home. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 一些人认为孩子们可以通过看电视有效地学习。因此，应该鼓励孩子们在学校和家里定期看电视。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: In the past, the role of teacher was to provide information. today, students have access to wide sources of information. There is, therefore, no role of teacher in modern education. Do you agree or disagree?
zh: 在过去，老师的角色是提供信息。如今，学生可以接触到广泛的信息来源。因此，在现代教育中没有教师的角色。你同意还是不同意？

en: In the past, knowledge was stored in books, but now knowledge is stored on the internet, do you think the advantages outweigh the disadvantages?
zh: 过去，知识存储在书本上，但现在知识存储在互联网上，你认为利大于弊吗？

en: In some countries, people are having children at later age in life. What are the reasons? Do the advantages outweigh the disadvantages?
zh: 在一些国家，人们晚育的年龄越来越大。原因是什么？利大于弊吗？

en: In the past, people used to live in the same place in their life. however, it is common that now people change their place where they live several times during their life. What are the reasons for this change? Is this positive or negative development?
zh: 在过去，人们习惯于生活在同一个地方。然而，现在人们在一生中多次改变他们居住的地方是很常见的。这种变化的原因是什么？这是积极的还是消极的发展？

en: Some people say that advertising has positive economic effects, while others think it had negative social effects, because they are not satisfied with what they are and what they have. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 一些人说广告有积极的经济影响，而另一些人认为它有消极的社会影响，因为他们不满足于他们是什么和他们所拥有的。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: Children find it difficult to concentrate on or pay attention to schools. What are the reasons? How can we solve this problem?
zh: 孩子们发现很难集中注意力或注意学校。原因是什么？如何解决这个问题？

en: Some people believe that young people who commit serious crimes, such as robbery or violent attack, should be punished in the same way as adults. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 一些人认为，年轻人犯了严重的罪行，如抢劫或暴力袭击，应该像成年人一样受到惩罚。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: In many countries, it is convenient for people to buy a variety of food from all over the world. To what extent do you think the benefits outweigh the disadvantages?
zh: 在许多国家，人们可以方便地从世界各地买到各种各样的食物。你认为在多大程度上利大于弊？

en: The government should control the amount of violence in films and on television in order to decrease the level of violent crime in society. To what extent do you agree or disagree with the opinion?
zh: 政府应该控制电影和电视中暴力的数量，以减少社会暴力犯罪的水平。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: Give detailed description of crimes in newspaper and on television can have bad consequences. So information of this kind in the media should be restricted. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 请详细描述报纸和电视上的犯罪行为会产生的不良后果。因此，媒体上的这类信息应该受到限制。你在多大程度上同意还是不同意？

en: Some people think living in big cities is bad for people’s health. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 一些人认为生活在大城市对人们的健康有害。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: Theoretical subjects (such as maths and philosophy) should no longer be taught in universities because most of university students choose practical subjects (such as accounting and economics). To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 大学不应该再教授理论科目（如数学和哲学），因为大多数大学生选择实用科目（如会计和经济学）。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: Some people think a country benefits from a large proportion of young people university educated, other think sending young people to universities only leads to graduate unemployment. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 一些人认为一个国家从大量受过大学教育的年轻人中受益，另一些人认为送年轻人上大学只会导致毕业生失业。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: Government founding for university should only be provided for scholarship for the best students. All other funding for university can come from student fees and personal organizations. To what extent do you agree or disagree with this statement?
zh: 政府对大学的资助应该只提供给最优秀的学生奖学金。大学的所有其他资金都可以来自学生的学费和个人组织。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这种说法？

en: In many parts of the world, more freedom is given to children than they used to. Is it a positive or negative development?
zh: 在世界上的许多地方，孩子们比过去有了更多的自由。这是一种积极的还是消极的发展？

en: Some people think parents should read or tell stories to children. Others think parents needn’t do that as children can read books or watch TV, discuss the both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 有些人认为父母应该给孩子读故事或讲故事。另一些人认为父母不需要这样做，因为孩子可以读书或看电视，讨论两种观点并给出自己的观点。

views.claim_zh:
1观点：陪伴，加强亲子关系relationship，bond
2观点：获得知识

en: More attention is paid to being “responsible tourists” in order to preserve both culture and environment. however, some people think it is impossible to be a responsible tourist. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 为了保护文化和环境，人们更加注重做“负责任的游客”。然而，一些人认为做一个负责任的游客是不可能的。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: In some cities, planners have located shops, school, offices and homes in specific areas which may be widely separated from each other. Do the advantages outweigh the disadvantages?
zh: 在一些城市，规划者把商店、学校、办公室和住宅都设在彼此相距很远的特定区域。利大于弊吗？

en: Some people think that a university student should choose a particular subject rather than a wide range of subject. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 一些人认为大学生应该选择一个特定的学科，而不是广泛的学科。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: Some groups of people have benefited from modern communication technology, but others think they don’t benefit from it at all. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 一些人从现代通信技术中受益，但另一些人认为他们根本没有从中受益。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这种观点？

en: In recent years, the pressure on school and university students is increasing and they are pushed to work hard at very young age. Do you think it is a positive or negative development?
zh: 近年来，学校和大学生的压力越来越大，他们被迫在很小的时候就努力学习。你认为这是一个积极的还是消极的发展？

en: Full-time students should spend a lot of time studying in the university, but it is essential to be involved in other activities. Do you think it is a positive or negative development?
zh: 全日制学生在大学里应该花很多时间学习，但参加其他活动也是必不可少的。你认为这是一个积极的还是消极的发展？

en: Some people think that any government money spent on supporting artists (such as painters, musicians and poets) should be better spent on more important things. Do you agree or disagree?
zh: 一些人认为政府花在支持艺术家（如画家、音乐家和诗人）上的钱应该花在更重要的事情上。你同意还是不同意？

en: An increasing number of people are changing their careers and places of residence. Is it a positive or negative development?
zh: 越来越多的人正在改变他们的职业和居住地。这是一种积极的还是消极的发展？

en: Some people think that the government should do more to make their citizens have a healthy diet. others, however, believe that individuals should be responsible for their own diet and health. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 一些人认为政府应该做更多的事情来让他们的公民有一个健康的饮食。然而，另一些人认为个人应该对自己的饮食和健康负责。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: In some countries the widespread use of internet has given people more freedom to work or study at home instead of traveling to work or college. Do the advantages outweigh the disadvantages?
zh: 在一些国家，互联网的广泛使用给了人们更多的自由在家里工作或学习，而不是去上班或上大学。利大于弊吗？

en: It is not necessary to travel to other places to learn about culture and people, because people can learn from books, films and the internet. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 没有必要去其他地方学习文化和人民，因为人们可以从书籍，电影和互联网上学习。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: Some people believe the purpose of education is to prepare individuals to be useful to the society, while others say the purpose is to help the individual to achieve personal ambitions. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 一些人认为教育的目的是让个人成为对社会有用的人，而另一些人则认为教育的目的是帮助个人实现个人抱负。讨论两种观点，并给出你自己的观点。

en: Some people think young people are not suitable for important positions in the government, while other people think it is a good idea for young people to take on these positions. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 有些人认为年轻人不适合担任政府的重要职位，而另一些人则认为年轻人担任这些职位是一个好主意。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: Nowadays, people can live and work in anywhere, because of the improving communication technology and transport. Do you think its advantages outweigh its disadvantage?
zh: 如今，由于通讯技术和交通的改善，人们可以在任何地方生活和工作。你认为它的优点大于缺点吗？

en: It is a good idea for old people to continue to work, if it is possible. Do you agree or disagree?
zh: 如果可能的话，老年人继续工作是个好主意。同意还是不同意？

en: Online shopping is replacing shopping in stores. Do you think it is a positive or negative development?
zh: 网上购物正在取代实体店购物。你认为这是一个积极的还是消极的发展？

en: As major cities around the world are growing fast and many problems occur. What are the problems have been brought to young people living in cities by the continued growth? What solutions do you suggest?
zh: 随着世界主要城市的快速发展，出现了许多问题。城市的持续增长给生活在城市中的年轻人带来了哪些问题？你有什么建议？

en: Too much money is spent in maintaining and repairing old buildings, some people think that they should be knocked down and give way to the modern buildings. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 太多的钱花在维护和修复老建筑上，有些人认为应该把它们推倒，让位于现代建筑。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: A rise in the standard of living in a country often only seems to benefits cities rather than rural areas. What problems might this difference causes? How might these problems be reduced?
zh: 一个国家生活水平的提高似乎往往只使城市而不是农村地区受益。这种差异可能会导致什么问题？如何减少这些问题？

en: In many countries, more and more fathers are staying at home to look after children, while mothers work full-time. What are the reasons? Is it positive or negative?
zh: 在许多国家，越来越多的父亲留在家里照顾孩子，而母亲则全职工作。原因是什么呢？是积极的还是消极的？

en: Many people believe that the social networking sites have had a huge impact on both individuals and society. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 许多人认为社交网站对个人和社会都产生了巨大的影响。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: In many countries, more and more people buy a wider range of household goods like television, microwave oven and rice cooker. Do you think this is a positive or negative development?
zh: 在许多国家，越来越多的人购买更广泛的家庭用品，如电视、微波炉和电饭煲。你认为这是一个积极的还是消极的发展？

en: In some countries, there is an ever-increasing proportion of population aged 15 or younger. What do you think the effect of current and future in those countries?
zh: 在一些国家，15岁或15岁以下的人口比例不断增加。你认为现在和未来对这些国家的影响是什么？

en: The restoration of old buildings in major cities throughout the world often involves numerous government expenditure. This money will bring more benefits if it is used to provide new housing or road development. To what extend do you agree or disagree?
zh: 世界主要城市的旧建筑修复通常涉及大量的政府支出。这笔钱如果用于提供新的住房或道路发展，将会带来更多的好处。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: Some people believe that people who read books can develop more imagination and language skills than those who prefer to watch TV. To what extent do you agree or disagree with this opinion?
zh: 一些人认为读书的人比那些喜欢看电视的人能发展更多的想象力和语言技能。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这种观点？

en: As countries develop, more and more people buy and use their own cars. Do the advantages for individuals outweigh the disadvantages for the environment?
zh: 随着国家的发展，越来越多的人购买和使用自己的汽车。个人的利大于环境的弊吗？

en: Some people think imprisonment is the best solution to crime, but others argue that education is a more efficient way to reduce crime. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 一些人认为监禁是解决犯罪的最好办法，但另一些人认为教育是减少犯罪的更有效的方法。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: Some people think that one of the best ways to solve environmental problems is to increase the cost of fuels for cars and other vehicles. To what extent do you agree or disagree with this statement.
zh: 一些人认为解决环境问题的最好方法之一是增加汽车和其他交通工具的燃料成本。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这种说法？

en: Many countries spend a lot of money preparing competitors to take part in major sports competitions such as the Olympics and the football world cup, but it would be better to spend this money encouraging children to take up sports from a young age. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 许多国家花了很多钱来准备运动员参加像奥运会和足球世界杯这样的大型体育比赛，但是最好把这笔钱花在鼓励孩子们从小就参加体育运动上。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: Some people think reading newspapers is the best way to learn about news, while others think a more effective way is through other media. Discuss both views and give your opinion.
zh: 有些人认为读报纸是了解新闻的最好方式，而另一些人认为通过其他媒体是更有效的方式。讨论两种观点并给出你的观点。

en: Some people think the most important thing about being rich is that it gives people an opportunity to help others. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 有些人认为富有最重要的是它给了人们一个帮助别人的机会。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: Governments should make people responsible for looking after their own local environment. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 政府应该让人们负责保护自己的当地环境。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: People today can shop, work and communicate with others via the Internet. They don't need to do these face-to-face. Is it a positive or negative development?
zh: 今天的人们可以通过互联网购物、工作和与他人交流。他们不需要面对面地做这些。这是一种积极还是消极的发展？

en: In some countries, an increasing number of parents choose to educate their children at home by themselves instead of sending them to school. Do the advantages of home education outweigh the disadvantages?
zh: 在一些国家，越来越多的父母选择自己在家教育孩子，而不是送他们去学校。在家教育的利大于弊吗？

en: Traffic and housing problems can be solved by moving big companies and industries and their employees to the countryside. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 交通和住房问题可以通过将大公司、大产业及其员工迁往农村来解决。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: The art forms like paintings and music do not directly improve people’s life, so governments should spend money on other important areas. Do you agree or disagree?
zh: 像绘画和音乐这样的艺术形式并不能直接改善人们的生活，所以政府应该把钱花在其他重要的领域。你是否同意？

en: In many countries, people like to eat a wide variety of food that can be grown in other areas. As a result, people eat more food produced in other regions than local food. Do the advantages of this trend outweigh its disadvantages?
zh: 在许多国家，人们喜欢吃各种各样的食物，这些食物可以在其他地区种植。因此，人们吃的其他地区生产的食物比当地食物要多。这种趋势的利大于弊吗？

en: Children are face educational, social and commercial pressures. What are the causes of these pressures? What measures should be taken to reduce them?
zh: 孩子们面临着教育、社会和商业的压力。造成这些压力的原因是什么？应该采取什么措施来减少这些压力？

en: Many people today prefer to socialize online to spending time with friends in local community. Do the advantages outweigh the disadvantages?
zh: 如今，许多人更喜欢在线社交，而不是与当地社区的朋友共度时光。利大于弊吗？

en: Today many young people change their jobs or careers every few years. What do you think are the reasons for this? Do you think the advantages outweigh its disadvantages?
zh: 如今，许多年轻人每隔几年就换一次工作或职业。你认为这其中的原因是什么？你认为利大于弊吗？

en: More and more people want to buy famous brands of clothes, cars and other items. What are the reasons? Do you think it is a positive or negative development?
zh: 越来越多的人想买名牌的衣服、汽车和其他物品。原因是什么？你认为这是一个积极的还是消极的发展？

en: An increasing number of people are changing careers during their working life. What are the reasons for this? Is it a positive or negative development?
zh: 越来越多的人在他们的职业生涯中改变职业。这是什么原因呢？这是一个积极的还是消极的发展？

en: People have different views on government’s measures of reducing traffic congestion. Some think it can be solved by building more train and subway lines, while others think that building more roads and widening existing roads will reduce traffic congestion. Discuss both views and give your opinion.
zh: 人们对政府减少交通拥堵的措施有不同的看法。一些人认为可以通过修建更多的火车和地铁线路来解决，而另一些人则认为修建更多的道路和拓宽现有的道路会减少交通拥堵。讨论两种观点并给出你的观点。

en: These days, an increasing number of people in many cities know little about their neighbours and do not have a sense of community. What do you think are the causes and what solutions can you suggest?
zh: 如今，在许多城市中，越来越多的人对他们的邻居知之甚少，没有社区意识。你认为原因是什么？你能提出什么解决方案？

en: Many businesses find that new employees who just finished their education lack basic interpersonal ability such as work with others as a part of team. What do you think are the causes of this problem? What measures should be taken to solve this problem?
zh: 许多企业发现，刚完成学业的新员工缺乏基本的人际交往能力，比如作为团队的一员与他人合作。你认为造成这个问题的原因是什么？应该采取什么措施来解决这个问题？

en: Some people who have been in prison become good citizens later. Some people think that they are the best people to talk to school students about the danger of committing a crime. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 有些坐过牢的人后来成了好公民。有些人认为他们是向学生讲述犯罪危险的最佳人选。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: Some people say modern children’s game do not develop a wide range of skills, while traditional games can be much better for developing such skills. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 有人说，现代儿童游戏不能培养广泛的技能，而传统游戏可以更好地培养这些技能。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这种观点？

en: Nowadays advertising aimed at children is on the rise. Some people think this has negative effects and should be banned. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 如今，针对儿童的广告越来越多。一些人认为这有负面影响，应该被禁止。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: Some people think that schools should stop teaching students by using books, because students find them boring and that children can learn from films, TV, video games and computer instead. To what extent do you agree?
zh: 一些人认为学校应该停止用书本来教学生，因为学生们觉得书本很无聊，而孩子们可以从电影、电视、电子游戏和电脑中学习。你在多大程度上同意这个观点？

en: Some people say that children should go to school as young as possible, while others believe that children should go to school at least 7 years old. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 有些人说孩子应该尽可能早上学，而另一些人则认为孩子应该至少在7岁上学。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: Nowadays people always throw old things away. What causes this problem? What effect does the phenomenon lead to?
zh: 现在人们总是把旧东西扔掉。是什么导致了这个问题？这种现象会导致什么影响？

en: Some people say that children should go to school as young as possible, while others believe that children should go to school of at least 7 years old. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 有些人说孩子应该尽可能早上学，而另一些人则认为孩子应该至少在7岁的时候上学。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: In many countries nowadays, more and more women have full-time jobs as men, so there is logic that men and women should share the housework tasks equally. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 如今在许多国家，越来越多的女性像男性一样从事全职工作，因此男女应该平等分担家务是合乎逻辑的。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: Team/ group activities can teach more important skills for life than those activities which are played alone. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 团队/小组活动比那些单独进行的活动能教会人们更多重要的生活技能。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: Some groups, such as poor people or people from rural areas find it difficult to access the university education. Universities should make it especially easy for the students coming from the rural areas to get an access to the university. To what extent do you agree or disagree this opinion?
zh: 一些群体，如穷人或农村地区的人发现很难获得大学教育。大学应该让来自农村地区的学生更容易进入大学。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这一观点？

en: In many countries, women are allowed to take maternity leaves from their jobs during the first months after the birth of their baby. Do the advantages outweigh the disadvantages?
zh: 在许多国家，女性在孩子出生后的头几个月可以休产假。利大于弊吗？

en: Report shows that it is increasingly expensive to keep museums open to public. Find the best way to fund them (government, business or individuals).
zh: 报告显示，保持博物馆对公众开放的成本越来越高。找到资助博物馆的最佳方式（政府、企业或个人）。

en: Some people think that young people should spend more of their free time at home with their family instead of entertaining outside. Others disagree. Discuss both views and give your ow opinion.
zh: 一些人认为年轻人应该把更多的空闲时间花在家里和家人在一起，而不是出去娱乐。其他人不同意。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: It is shown that many criminals have a low level of education. Some people argue that the best way to reduce crime is to educate criminals in person to help them find jobs when leave prison. Do you agree or disagree?
zh: 这表明许多罪犯的受教育程度很低。一些人认为减少犯罪的最好方法是亲自教育罪犯，帮助他们离开监狱后找到工作。你同意还是不同意？

en: Some employers are giving increased importance to social skills in addition to good qualifications. Do you agree or disagree that skills are as important as good qualifications for success in jobs?
zh: 除了良好的资历外，一些雇主更加重视社交技巧。你是否同意技能和良好的资格对于工作成功同样重要？

en: Some people think that the qualities a person needs to become successful in today’s world cannot be learned at a university or any similar institution. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 一些人认为，在当今世界，一个人要想取得成功所需要的素质是无法从大学或任何类似的机构中学到的。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这种观点？

en: Some people believe that spending money on developing technology for space exploration is unjustifiable, and there are more beneficial ways to spend money. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 有些人认为把钱花在开发太空探索技术上是不合理的，还有更有益的花钱方式。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: Some people think that the schools should select their pupils to their academic ability. Others believe that young people with different abilities should be educated together. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 一些人认为学校应该根据他们的学术能力来选择学生。另一些人认为不同能力的年轻人应该在一起接受教育。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: Some people believe that young people know about international pop and movies stars they like, but they know less about famous people from the history in their own country. Why is this? How can more interest be increased in young people to gain more knowledge about their famous people from history?
zh: 有些人认为年轻人了解他们喜欢的国际流行音乐和电影明星，但他们对自己国家历史上的名人了解较少。这是为什么？如何才能增加年轻人的兴趣，从历史上获得更多关于他们的名人的知识？

views.claim_zh: 社交媒体．推送(feed)，热搜(trending topic)

（有局限性→只了解当地的历史）学校组织参观历史博物馆
鼓励艺术创作（电影，电视剧，游戏）

en: In some cities, there are few controls over the design and construction of new homes and office buildings, and owners can decide on whatever design and size they like. Do you think that the advantages of this approach outweigh the disadvantages?
zh: 在一些城市，对新住宅和办公楼的设计和建造几乎没有控制，业主可以决定他们喜欢的设计和大小。你认为这种做法利大于弊吗？

en: Some people argue that the fittest and strongest individuals and teams can achieve the greatest success in sports. But other people think success is much related to the mental attitude. Discuss both views and give your opinion. In modern world, it is no longer necessary to use animals for food or use animal products, like clothing and medicines. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 有些人认为，最健康、最强壮的个人和团队才能在体育运动中取得最大的成功。但另一些人认为成功与心态有很大关系。讨论两种观点并给出你的观点。在现代世界，不再有必要使用动物作为食物或使用动物产品，如衣服和药物。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: When new town is planned, it is more important to develop public parks and sports facilities than shopping centers for people to spend their free time in. do you agree or disagree? The environmental problem in the world cannot be solved by ordinary people because what they can do is too little. And it is also the responsibility of politicians. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 在规划新城镇时，开发公园和体育设施比开发购物中心更重要，人们可以在那里度过闲暇时间。你同意与否？世界上的环境问题不可能由普通人来解决，因为他们能做的太少了。这也是政治家的责任。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: In some countries, people waste a lot of food which is bought in shops and restaurants. What do you think are the reasons? What can be done to solve this problem? Some people think the best way to improve road safety is to increase the minimum legal age for driving cars and motorcycles. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 在一些国家，人们浪费了很多在商店和餐馆买的食物。你认为原因是什么？可以做些什么来解决这个问题？一些人认为改善道路安全的最好方法是提高驾驶汽车和摩托车的最低法定年龄。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: More and more people are reading news online, but newspapers are still the main source of news for most people. To what extent do you agree or disagree? Some people think that newspapers are the best way to learn news. However, others believe that they can learn news more effectively through other media. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 越来越多的人在网上阅读新闻，但报纸仍然是大多数人的主要新闻来源。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这种观点？有些人认为报纸是了解新闻的最好方式。然而，其他人认为他们可以通过其他媒体更有效地学习新闻。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: Some people believe that women should play an equal role as men in a country’s police force or military force, while others think women are not suitable for these kinds of jobs. Discuss both views and give your opinion.
zh: 有些人认为女性应该在一个国家的警察部队或军队中扮演与男性平等的角色，而另一些人则认为女性不适合这些工作。讨论两种观点并给出你的观点。

en: New technologies have changed the way children spend their free time. Do you think the advantages outweigh the disadvantages? Some people claim that public museums and art galleries will not be needed because people can see historic objects and works of art by using a computer. Do you agree or disagree with this opinion?
zh: 新技术改变了孩子们度过业余时间的方式。你认为利大于弊吗？一些人认为公共博物馆和艺术画廊将不再需要，因为人们可以通过使用电脑看到历史文物和艺术作品。你同意还是不同意这种观点？

en: Nowadays, children spend too much time watching TV and playing computer games. Some people believe this had negative effects on children’s mental ability. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 现在，孩子们花太多时间看电视和玩电脑游戏。一些人认为这对孩子的智力有负面影响。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: Some people hold that we should spend a large amount of time and money on the protection of wild animals. Some people argue that they should be spent on human populations. To what extent do you agree or disagree? More and more people today want to buy goods for example clothes and smart phones, with well-known brand names. Why is this? Is this a positive or negative development?
zh: 一些人认为我们应该花费大量的时间和金钱来保护野生动物。有些人认为应该把时间和金钱花在人口上。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？现在越来越多的人想买知名品牌的商品，比如衣服和智能手机。这是为什么呢？这是一个积极的还是消极的发展？

en: Employers should give their staff at least a 4-week holiday a year to make employees better at their jobs. To what extent do you agree or disagree? The world of work is changing rapidly and people cannon depend on the same job or the same conditions of work for life. Discuss the possible causes for these changes and give your suggestions on how people should prepare for work in the future?
zh: 雇主应该每年给员工至少4周的假期，让员工更好地完成工作。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？工作世界正在迅速变化，人们可能一辈子都依赖于同样的工作或同样的工作条件。讨论这些变化的可能原因，并就人们应该如何为未来的工作做准备给出你的建议？

en: As part of education, students should spend a period of time studying and living in a different country to learn language and culture. To what extent do you agree or disagree? Some people believe that the only purpose of films is to entertain, others says that films also have educational value. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 作为教育的一部分，学生应该花一段时间在不同的国家学习和生活，学习语言和文化。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？有人认为电影的唯一目的就是娱乐，也有人说电影也有教育价值。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: Newspapers have an enormous influence on people’s ideas and opinions. Why is this the case? Is it a positive or negative situation? Some people think the best way to reduce crime is to give longer prison sentences. Others, however, think these are better alternative ways to reduce crime. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 报纸对人们的思想和观点有巨大的影响。为什么会这样呢？这是一个积极的还是消极的情况？有些人认为减少犯罪的最好办法是延长刑期。然而，其他人认为这些是减少犯罪的更好的替代方法。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: Once children start school, teachers have more influence on their intellectual and social development than parents do. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 一旦孩子开始上学，老师对他们的智力和社交发展的影响比父母更大。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点?

views.claim_zh:
否定：
老师：
家长（影响大）：遗传-->智力，再进入学校前社交能力基本已经定型

en: Some people think that the best way to reduce the time spent on traveling to work is to replace parks and gardens close to the city center with apartment buildings for commuters, but others disagree. Discuss both views and give your own opinion. People have little understanding of the importance of the natural world. What are the reasons and how can people learn more about the natural worlds?
zh: 一些人认为减少上班路上花费的时间的最好方法是把靠近市中心的公园和花园换成供通勤者使用的公寓楼，但另一些人不同意。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。人们对自然界的重要性了解甚少。原因是什么？人们怎样才能更多地了解自然世界？

views.claim_zh: 通勤时间和通勤距离的关系

en: Some people believe famous people’s support towards international aid organizations draws attention to problems, while others think celebrities make the problems less important. Discuss both views and give your opinion. In many countries, people like to eat a wider variety of food than what can be grown in their local area. As a result, much of the food people eat today has to come from other regions. Do you think the advantages of this development outweigh the disadvantages?
zh: 有些人认为名人对国际援助组织的支持引起了人们对问题的关注，而另一些人则认为名人使问题变得不那么重要。讨论两种观点并给出你的观点。在许多国家，人们喜欢吃各种各样的食物，而不是当地种植的食物。因此，今天人们吃的很多食物必须来自其他地区。你认为这种发展的利大于弊吗？

en: Young people from home in rural areas have a study for work in cities. What are the reasons? Do advantages outweigh the disadvantages. Nowadays many people in the big cities live alone or in the small family unit, rather than an extended family. Is this positive or negative trend?
zh: 农村地区的年轻人为了到城市工作而学习。原因是什么？利大于弊吗？如今，大城市里的许多人独居或小家庭，而不是大家庭。这种趋势是积极的还是消极的？

en: Some people think certain old buildings are worth preserving more than the other ones. Which types of old buildings should be preserved? Do you think the advantages of preserving old buildings outweigh the disadvantages? Some people say that it is a waste of time on planning for the future and that it is more important to focus on the present. Do you agree or disagree?
zh: 有些人认为某些老建筑比其他的更值得保护。哪些类型的老建筑应该被保护？你认为保护老建筑的利大于弊吗？有人说规划未来是浪费时间，关注现在更重要。你同意还是不同意？

en: Technology has been increasingly used in the workplace. Some people find that it is good for young people’s prospects of gaining job but harder for old people. To what extent do you agree or disagree? Today many children spend a lot of time playing computer games and little time on sports. Why is this the case? Is it a positive or negative development?
zh: 科技已经越来越多地应用于工作场所。一些人发现这对年轻人找工作的前景有好处，但对老年人来说却很难。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？现在很多孩子花很多时间玩电脑游戏，很少有时间做运动。为什么会这样呢？这是一个积极的还是消极的发展？

en: Most of the world’s problems are caused by over-population. To what extent do you agree or disagree? Some business finds that new employees finishing their education lack basic interpersonal ability such as working with others as a part of a team. What do you think are the causes of this problem? And how to solve this problem?
zh: 世界上的大多数问题都是由人口过剩引起的。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？一些企业发现刚完成学业的新员工缺乏基本的人际交往能力，比如作为团队的一员与他人合作。你认为造成这个问题的原因是什么？如何解决这个问题？

en: Employers should give their staff at least a 4-week holiday a year to make employees better tat their jobs. To what extent do you agree or disagree? People are surrounded by many kinds of advertising which can influence their life. These have positive effects on people’s life. Do you agree or disagree?
zh: 雇主应该每年给员工至少4周的假期，让员工更好地完成他们的工作。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？人们被各种各样的广告所包围，这些广告会影响他们的生活。这些对人们的生活有积极的影响。你同意还是不同意？

en: In many parts of the world children and teenagers are committing more crimes. Why is this case happening? How should children or teenagers be punished? In some cities, there are few controls over the design and construction of new homes and office buildings. Do you think the advantages of this approach outweigh the disadvantages?
zh: 在世界许多地方，儿童和青少年犯罪越来越多。为什么会发生这种情况？儿童或青少年应该受到怎样的惩罚？在一些城市，对新住宅和办公楼的设计和建造几乎没有控制。你认为这种做法利大于弊吗？

en: Human activity has a negative effect on plant and animal species. Some people think it is too late to do anything. Some people believe that effective action can be taken to improve this solution. Discuss both views and your opinion. An increasing number of developing countries are expanding tourist industries. Why is it the case? Is it a positive development?
zh: 人类活动对动植物物种有负面影响。一些人认为现在做任何事情都太晚了。有些人认为可以采取有效的行动来改善这个解决方案。讨论两种观点和你的观点。越来越多的发展中国家正在发展旅游业。为什么会这样呢？这是一个积极的发展吗？

en: Some people say individuals can do nothing to improve the environment and only government and large companies can make a difference. Do you agree or disagree? Nowadays many people in the big cities live alone or in the small family unit, rather than an extended family. Is this a positive or negative trend?
zh: 有人说，个人对改善环境无能为力，只有政府和大公司才能有所作为。你同意还是不同意？如今，大城市里的许多人独居或以小家庭为单位，而不是大家庭。这是一个积极的还是消极的趋势？

en: As countries develop, many people buy and use their own cars. Do you think the advantages of the individual outweigh the environmental disadvantages? Many museums and historical sites are mainly visited by tourists, not local people. Why is this the case and what can be done to attract local people?
zh: 随着国家的发展，许多人购买和使用自己的汽车。你认为个人的好处大于环境的坏处吗？许多博物馆和历史遗迹主要是游客参观的，而不是当地人。为什么会出现这种情况，又能做些什么来吸引当地人？

en: Some people claim that many things that children are taught at school are a waste of time. Other people argue that everything study at school is useful at some time.
