Discuss both views and give your own opinion. Some people think sending criminals to prison is not an effective way to deal with them. Education and training are better. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 一些人声称，孩子们在学校里教的很多东西都是浪费时间。另一些人认为在学校学习的东西在某些时候是有用的。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。一些人认为把罪犯送进监狱并不是处理他们的有效方法。教育和培训是更好的办法。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: Research days more and more business training and business meetings are taking place online. Do the advantages outweigh the disadvantages? The food travels thousands of miles from farm to consumer. Some people think it would be better to our environment and economy if people only ate local produced food. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 越来越多的商务培训和商务会议在网上进行。利大于弊吗？食物从农场到消费者手中要经过数千英里的运输。有些人认为，如果人们只吃当地生产的食物，对我们的环境和经济会更好。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: The restoration of old buildings in major cities in the world costs numerous government’s expenditure. This money should be used in new housing and road development. Do you agree or disagree?
zh: 世界主要城市的旧建筑的修复花费了大量的政府开支。这些钱应该用在新住房和道路建设上。你同意还是不同意？

en: Many people aim to achieve a balance between work and other parts of lives, but few people achieve it. what are the problems in trying it and how to overcome it? News reports in the media tend to focus on problems and emergencies rather than on positive developments. This is harmful to the individual and society. To what extent do you agree or disagree with this statement?
zh: 许多人的目标是在工作和生活的其他部分之间取得平衡，但很少有人能做到这一点。在尝试的过程中会遇到哪些问题，如何克服呢？媒体的新闻报道往往关注问题和突发事件，而不是积极的事态发展。这对个人和社会都是有害的。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这种说法？

en: Some parents give their children everything that their children ask for or they want to do. Is this good for children? What could be consequences for these children when they grow up? In many countries, the quality of life in large cities is becoming worse. What are the causes of this problem? What measures do you think should be taken to tackle this problem?
zh: 有些父母给他们的孩子所有他们的孩子要求或他们想要做的。这对孩子有好处吗？这些孩子长大后会有什么后果呢？在许多国家，大城市的生活质量正在变得越来越差。造成这个问题的原因是什么？你认为应该采取什么措施来解决这个问题？

en: Some people think it is important for all children to learn history in school. Others believe that other subjects are more relevant to children’s lives today. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 一些人认为所有的孩子在学校学习历史是很重要的。另一些人认为其他科目与孩子们今天的生活更相关。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: Some people say that drug companies have the responsibility to spend money on researching medicine to help the poorer countries, others think the main responsibility of drug companies is making money. Discuss both views and give your own opinion. Some people think that zoos are cruel and all the zoos should be closed. However, others think zoos are useful to protect rare animals. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 一些人说制药公司有责任花钱研究药物来帮助贫穷国家，另一些人认为制药公司的主要责任是赚钱。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。有些人认为动物园很残忍，所有的动物园都应该关闭。然而，其他人认为动物园对保护稀有动物是有用的。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: More and more parents are allowing their children to play on computers and tablets as they think that children should learn technology skills. Do the advantages of this development outweigh the disadvantages? Some people think that supermarkets and manufactures should take responsibility to reduce the amount of packaging while others think consumers should not buy the products with much packaging. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 越来越多的父母允许他们的孩子玩电脑和平板电脑，因为他们认为孩子应该学习技术技能。这种发展的利大于弊吗？一些人认为超市和制造商应该有责任减少包装的数量，而另一些人则认为消费者不应该购买包装太多的产品。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

views.claim_zh: 允许孩子用平板/电脑玩耍的主要好处是，他们更早获得“数字熟练度”，以后学习与生活用技术更顺。
views.claim_en: Children playing on computers and tablets would gain early digital fluency, which helps children use technology more confidently later.
views.analysis_zh:
起点A：频繁接触设备 → 熟悉基本操作（点按、输入、菜单、搜索）
→ 遇到学习平台/作业软件时阻力更小
→ 终点：更快适应数字化学习环境

起点B：在游戏/应用中反复试错
→ 学会“按步骤操作、解决小问题”（例如设置、保存、更新）
→ 终点：更强的技术自信与独立性
views.analysis_en:
Start A: Frequent exposure → basic operations become automatic
→ less friction with school apps and online tools
→ End: smoother adjustment to digital learning

Start B: Repeated trial-and-error in apps/games
→ learns simple problem-solving (settings, saving, updates)
→ End: stronger tech confidence and independence

views.claim_zh: 但更常见、占比更大的结果是“设备娱乐化使用”导致过度屏幕时间，削弱专注与自控，因此弊大于利。
views.claim_en: However, the more common outcome is overuse for entertainment, which weakens attention and self-control; therefore, disadvantages outweigh advantages.
views.analysis_zh:
起点A：游戏/短内容的即时奖励强
→ 孩子习惯快速刺激与即时反馈
→ 需要耐心的任务（阅读、作业）变得更难坚持
→ 终点：注意力与延迟满足能力下降

起点B：屏幕时间挤占睡眠与户外活动
→ 更晚睡/睡眠质量差 + 久坐
→ 情绪波动、疲劳感上升
→ 终点：学习状态与身心健康受损
views.analysis_en:
Start A: Instant rewards from games/fast content
→ children get used to constant stimulation
→ slow tasks (reading/homework) feel harder to sustain
→ End: weaker attention and delayed gratification

Start B: Screen time crowds out sleep and outdoor activity
→ later bedtime + sedentary routine
→ more fatigue and mood swings
→ End: poorer well-being and learning quality

en: Research into new types of medicine and treatments are essential for improving health and deal with diseases. Who do you think should fund these researches: private companies, individuals or governments? There are more new towns nowadays. It is more important to include public parks and sports facilities than shopping centers for individuals to spend their free time. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 研究新型药物和治疗方法对于改善健康和治疗疾病至关重要。你认为谁应该资助这些研究：私人公司、个人还是政府？现在有更多的新城。更重要的是要包括公园和体育设施，而不是购物中心，让个人度过他们的空闲时间。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: Nowadays, some people claim that public museums and art galleries will not be needed because people can see historical objects and works of art by using a computer. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 现在，一些人声称公共博物馆和艺术画廊将不再需要，因为人们可以通过使用电脑看到历史文物和艺术作品。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这种观点？

en: Some people say that economic growth is the only way to end world poverty and hunger. Others say that economic growth is causing damage to the environment and should be stopped now. discuss both views and give your opinion. The increase in the production of consumer goods results in damage to the natural environment .what are the causes of this? What can be done to solve this problem?
zh: 有人说，经济增长是消除世界贫困和饥饿的唯一途径。另一些人说，经济增长正在对环境造成破坏，现在应该停止。讨论两种观点并给出你的观点。消费品生产的增加导致了对自然环境的破坏。造成这种情况的原因是什么？如何解决这个问题？

en: In some countries, secondary schools aim to provide a general education across a range of subjects. In others, children focus on a narrow range of subjects related to a particular career. For today’s world, which system is appropriate?
zh: 在一些国家，中学旨在提供一系列学科的通识教育。在另一些国家，孩子们专注于与特定职业相关的狭窄科目。对于今天的世界来说，哪种系统是合适的？

en: It is a natural process for animal species to become extinct (e.g.. Dinosaurs and dodos). This is no reason for people to prevent them from this happening. Do you agree or disagree? Some people think that cultural traditions will be destroyed when they are used as money-making machines aimed at tourists. Other people believe that it is the only way to save such traditions in the world today. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 动物物种走向灭绝是一个自然的过程(例如……恐龙和渡渡鸟)。这不是人们阻止它们发生的理由。你同意还是不同意？一些人认为，当文化传统被用作针对游客的赚钱机器时，它们将被破坏。另一些人认为这是当今世界上拯救这些传统的唯一方法。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: In some countries, the difference in age between parents and children is general greater than it was in the past. Do you think the advantages outweigh disadvantages? Fossil fuels such as coal, oil and natural gas, are used in many countries. Recently, in some countries, the use of alternative energy including wind and solar power has been encouraged. Is this trend a positive or a negative development?
zh: 在一些国家，父母和孩子之间的年龄差距通常比过去更大。你认为利大于弊吗？许多国家都在使用化石燃料，如煤、石油和天然气。最近，在一些国家，鼓励使用替代能源，包括风能和太阳能。这种发展趋势是积极的还是消极的？

en: The best way to reduce crime committed by young adults is to teach parents parenting skills. To what extent do you agree or disagree? In some countries, small town-center shops are going out of business because people tend to drive to large out-of-town stores. As a result, people without cars have limited access to out-of-town stories, and it may result in an increase in the use of cars. Do you think the disadvantages of this change outweigh its advantages?
zh: 减少年轻人犯罪的最好方法是教会父母育儿技巧。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？在一些国家，市中心的小商店正在倒闭，因为人们倾向于开车去城外的大商店。因此，没有车的人接触到城外故事的机会有限，这可能会导致汽车使用量的增加。你认为这种变化弊大于利吗？

en: More and more people are using computers and electric devices to access information, therefore there is no need for printed books, magazines and newspapers on paper. To what extent do you agree or disagree? Some people think it is necessary to use animals to test medicines intended for human. others, however, think it is cruel to do that. Discuss both of these views and give your own opinion.
zh: 越来越多的人使用电脑和电子设备来获取信息，因此没有必要在纸上印刷书籍、杂志和报纸。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？有些人认为有必要用动物来测试用于人类的药物。然而，另一些人认为这样做是残忍的。讨论这两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: The international community should take action immediately to reduce the consumption of fossil fuels. To what extent do you agree or disagree? Many people spend more and more time going to work or school. Some people think the trend is positive, while others think it is negative. Discuss both views and give your opinion.
zh: 国际社会应立即采取行动，减少化石燃料的消耗。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？许多人花在上班或上学上的时间越来越多。一些人认为这种趋势是积极的，而另一些人则认为它是消极的。讨论两种观点并给出你的观点。

en: Some people think that companies and private individuals should pay to clear up the pollution they produced. The government should not pay for it. to what extent do you agree or disagree? Although more and more read news on the internet, newspapers are still the most important source of news for the majority of people. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 有些人认为公司和个人应该付钱来清理他们产生的污染。政府不应该为此买单。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？虽然越来越多的人在网上看新闻，但对大多数人来说，报纸仍然是最重要的新闻来源。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: The world of work is changing rapidly and people cannot depend on the same job or the same conditions of work for life. Discuss the possible causes of this rapid change and give your suggestions on how people should prepare for work in the future? Throughout history, people dream to live in a perfect society while they haven’t agreed on how the ideal society would be like. What is the most important element you think to make a perfect society? How do people do to achieving an ideal society?
zh: 工作世界瞬息万变，人们不能一辈子依赖于同样的工作或同样的工作条件。讨论这种快速变化的可能原因，并就人们应该如何为未来的工作做准备给出你的建议？纵观历史，人们梦想生活在一个完美的社会中，而他们对理想社会的样子却没有达成一致。你认为创造一个完美社会最重要的因素是什么？人们如何实现一个理想的社会？

en:
In some cultures, the old age is highly valued; while in some cultures, youth is highly valued. Discuss both views and give your opinion. 亚太
Some people think sending criminals to prison is an effective way to deal with them. Others think education and training are better. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 在一些文化中，老年受到高度重视；而在一些文化中，年轻人则被高度重视。讨论两种观点并给出你的观点。有些人认为把罪犯送进监狱是处理他们的有效方法。另一些人认为教育和培训更好。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: Some people think that parents have a powerful influence in a child’s life, while the influence from outside the home plays a bigger part in a child’s development. To what extent do you agree or disagree? An increasing number of developing countries are expanding tourist industries. Why is it the case? Is it a positive development?
zh: 有些人认为父母对孩子的生活有很大的影响，而来自家庭以外的影响在孩子的发展中起着更大的作用。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？越来越多的发展中国家正在发展旅游业。为什么会这样呢？这是一个积极的发展吗？

en: In the modern age, some people think it is unnecessary to teach children the skill of handwriting. To what extent do you agree or disagree? Many young people today know more about international pop and movie stars than about famous people in the history of their country. Why is this? What can be done to increase young people’s interest in famous people in the history of their country?
zh: 在现代，有些人认为没有必要教孩子们书写的技巧。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？今天的许多年轻人对国际流行音乐和电影明星的了解比他们国家历史上的名人还要多。这是为什么？怎样才能增加年轻人对本国历史上名人的兴趣呢？

en: In modern world, it is no longer necessary to use animals for food or use animal products, for instance, clothing and medicines. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 在现代世界，不再需要使用动物作为食物或使用动物产品，例如，衣服和药物。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: Nowadays some older people choose to live in retirement communities with other people, rather than living with their adult children. Is it a positive or negative development? Nowadays a large amount of advertising aiming at children should be banned because of the negative effects. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 现在一些老年人选择和其他人一起住在退休社区，而不是和他们的成年子女住在一起。这是一个积极的还是消极的发展？现在大量针对儿童的广告应该被禁止，因为会产生负面影响。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: The young people in the workplace are changing their jobs or career every few years. What do you think are the reasons? Do you think the advantages outweigh the disadvantages? A few languages are increasingly spoken in different countries, while the usage of others is rapidly declining. Is this a positive or negative development?
zh: 职场上的年轻人每隔几年就会换工作或职业。你认为原因是什么？你认为利大于弊吗？有些语言在不同的国家越来越多地使用，而另一些语言的使用却在迅速下降。这是一种积极的还是消极的发展？

en: In many countries, today people are living in a ‘throwaway society’, where things are used in a short time and then thrown away. What are its causes? What are its problems? Nowadays some people say that children should go to school as young as possible. While others believe that children should to the school when they are at least seven years old. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 在许多国家，今天人们生活在一个“一次性社会”，在那里，东西在短时间内使用，然后扔掉。其原因是什么？它的问题是什么？现在有些人说孩子应该尽早上学。而另一些人则认为孩子应该在至少七岁的时候上学。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: Today, many people spend less and less time in their homes. What’s the reason for it? what are the effects of this trend on individuals and society?
zh: 今天，许多人花在家里的时间越来越少。这是什么原因？这种趋势对个人和社会的影响是什么？

en: Some people think that the climate change could have a negative effect on business. Other people think that climate change could create business more opportunities. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 一些人认为气候变化会对商业产生负面影响。另一些人认为气候变化可以为商业创造更多的机会。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: With growing population in cities, more and more people live in a home with small or no outdoor areas. Is it a positive or negative development?
zh: 随着城市人口的增长，越来越多的人住在一个小的或没有户外空间的家里。这是一种积极还是消极的发展？

en: Some people think that sport has an important role in our society. Others, however, feel that it is nothing more than a leisure activity. Discuss both views and give your own opinion
zh: 有些人认为体育在我们的社会中扮演着重要的角色。然而，另一些人则认为它只不过是一种休闲活动。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点

en: Some people think it is one of the best ways to solve the environmental problems by increasing the cost of fuels for cars and other vehicles. To what extent do you agree or disagree? The restoration of old buildings in major cities in the world spends numerous government expenditures. This money should be used in new housing and road development. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 一些人认为增加汽车和其他交通工具的燃料成本是解决环境问题的最好方法之一。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？世界主要城市的旧建筑修复花费了大量的政府支出。这些钱应该用在新住房和道路建设上。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: Films and computer games containing violence are popular. Some people say they have negative effects on society and should be banned. Others say they are just harmless relaxation. Discuss both views and give your opinion.
zh: 包含暴力的电影和电脑游戏很受欢迎。一些人说它们对社会有负面影响，应该被禁止。其他人说它们只是无害的放松。讨论两种观点并给出你的观点。

en: Some people argue that the government should not pay money for international aid when there are some disadvantaged people at home (homeless or unemployed). To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 有些人认为，当国内有一些弱势群体（无家可归或失业）时，政府不应该为国际援助付钱。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: Full time university students should spend a lot of time on their study, but it is also essential for them to be involved in other activities. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 全日制大学生应该花很多时间在学习上，但参加其他活动对他们来说也是必不可少的。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: Some people believe that rich countries should provide poorer countries with other types of help rather than financial aid. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 有些人认为富裕国家应该向贫穷国家提供其他类型的帮助，而不是财政援助。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: Some students take a year off studying between finishing school and going to University in order to travel or to work. Do the advantages outweigh the disadvantages?
zh: 有些学生在完成学业和上大学之间休息一年，以便旅行或工作。利大于弊吗？

en: Human activities have negative effects on plant and animal species. Some people think it is too late to do anything about this problem. Others believe effective measures can be taken to improve this situation. Discuss both views and give your opinion.
zh: 人类活动对动植物物种有负面影响。一些人认为现在对这个问题做任何事情都太晚了。另一些人认为可以采取有效的措施来改善这种状况。讨论两种观点并给出你的观点。

en: Many scientists believe that now we can study the behavior of a three-year-old child to see whether they will grow up to be criminals. To what extent do you think the human nature produces crimes? And how can we prevent children from growing up to be criminals?
zh: 许多科学家相信，现在我们可以研究一个三岁孩子的行为，看看他们长大后是否会成为罪犯。你认为人性在多大程度上产生犯罪？我们怎样才能防止孩子长大后成为罪犯？

en: The key solution for the environment is for the current generation to live a less comfortable life to benefit future generations. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 解决环境问题的关键是让这一代人过上不那么舒适的生活，以造福后代。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: Some people think it is more beneficial to play sports that are played in teams, e.g. football. And some people think individual sports, e.g. tennis and swimming, is better. Discuss about both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 有些人认为在团队中进行体育运动更有益，例如足球。有些人认为个人运动，如网球和游泳更好。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: Some people think having more TV channels is good because they will have more choices. While other people think too many TV channels only lead to a lot of poor-quality TV programs. Discuss both views and give your opinion.
zh: 有些人认为有更多的TV频道是好事，因为他们会有更多的选择。而另一些人则认为太多的TV频道只会导致很多低质量的TV节目。讨论两种观点并给出你的观点。

en: Today there is a great increase in anti-social behavior and lack of respect to others. What are the causes of this? What measures can be taken to reduce this problem?
zh: 今天，反社会行为和对他人缺乏尊重的现象大大增加。造成这种情况的原因是什么？可以采取什么措施来减少这个问题？

views.claim_zh: Anti-social → unfriendly 不是反社会

en: In today’s world of advanced science and technology, we still greatly value our artists and writers. What can arts tell us about life that science and technology cannot?
zh: 在科学技术发达的今天，我们仍然非常重视我们的艺术家和作家。关于生活，艺术能告诉我们什么科学技术不能告诉我们的？

en: Some people think that some subjects such as math and philosophy are difficult for some students, so people should take it as selective not compulsory. Do you agree or disagree?
zh: 有些人认为一些科目，如数学和哲学对一些学生来说很难，所以人们应该把它作为选修课而不是必修课。你是否同意？

en: An American film actor John Wayne said: “Tomorrow is the most important thing in life.” What is the importance for individuals and countries to think about future rather than focusing on the present?
zh: 美国电影演员约翰·韦恩说过：“明天是生命中最重要的事情。”对于个人和国家来说，考虑未来而不是关注现在有什么重要？

en: Anyone can use a mobile phone to answer both work and personal calls at any time of a day, or even seven days a week. Does this have more negative or positive effects on both individuals and society?
zh: 任何人都可以在一天中的任何时间，甚至是一周七天，使用手机接听工作和个人电话。这对个人和社会的影响是消极的还是积极的呢？

views.claim_zh: 工作与生活的平衡
紧急事情能被处理

en: Today, many tasks at home or work have been done by robots. Is this a positive or negative development?
zh: 如今，家庭或工作中的许多任务已经由机器人完成。这是一个积极的还是消极的发展？

en: Some scientists believe that intelligent life forms may exist on other planets and some want to send messages to contact them. Others think it is a bad idea because these life forms may be too dangerous. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 一些科学家认为，其他星球上可能存在智能生命形式，一些科学家想要发送信息与他们联系。另一些人则认为这是个坏主意，因为这些生命形式可能太危险了。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: Some people think that it’s good for a country’s cultures to show imported foreign films and TV programs. Other people think that countries should develop their own films and TV programs instead. Discuss both sides and give your own opinion.
zh: 有些人认为放映进口的外国电影和TV节目对一个国家的文化有好处。另一些人则认为各国应该发展自己的电影和TV节目。讨论双方并给出你自己的观点。

en: Some people think that the detailed criminal description on newspapers and TV has bad consequences, so this kind of information should be restricted on the media. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 一些人认为报纸和TV上详细的犯罪描述有不好的后果，所以这类信息应该限制在媒体上。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: There are many inventions in human history, but some people think that the most important invention is the Internet. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 人类历史上有许多发明，但有些人认为最重要的发明是互联网。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: Whether someone achieves his or her goal or not is mostly a question of luck. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 一个人是否达到了他或她的目标，主要是一个运气问题。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: People continue to commit crimes even after being punished for it. Why do you think this happens? How can crime be stopped?
zh: 即使受到惩罚，人们还是会继续犯罪。你认为为什么会发生这种情况？怎样才能制止犯罪？

en: Competitiveness is a positive quality for people to have in society. How does this competitiveness affect individuals? Do you think it is a positive or negative trend?
zh: 竞争力是人们在社会中具有的一种积极品质。这种竞争力是如何影响个人的？你认为这是一个积极的趋势还是消极的趋势？

en: Some people believe that it is the responsibility of the politicians rather than the individuals to reduce the environment damage. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 一些人认为减少环境破坏是政治家的责任而不是个人的责任。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: Some people think young people should be required to have full time education until they are at least 18 years old. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 有些人认为年轻人应该被要求接受全日制教育，直到他们至少18岁。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: Some people think that young people should follow the traditions of the society. Others think young people are free to behave as individuals. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 有些人认为年轻人应该遵循社会的传统。另一些人认为年轻人可以自由地表现自己。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: Some people think the government should invest more money in teaching science than other subjects in order for a country to develop and progress. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 一些人认为为了国家的发展和进步，政府应该在科学教育上投入比其他学科更多的钱。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

views.claim_zh:
同意
一个国家的发展和进步依赖于科学进步
科学教育本身需要投入更多的钱 成本高

en: Nowadays celebrities are more famous for their glamour and wealth than for their achievements, and this sets a bad example to young people. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 如今，名人更出名的是他们的魅力和财富，而不是他们的成就，这给年轻人树立了一个不好的榜样。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这种观点？

en: Nowadays young people are admiring media and sports stars, even though they do not set a good example. Do you think this is a positive or negative development?
zh: 现在的年轻人崇拜媒体和体育明星，尽管他们没有树立一个好榜样。你认为这是一个积极的还是消极的发展？

en: Some people think governments should spend money on measures to save languages with few speakers from dying out completely. Others think this is a waste of financial resources. Discuss both views and give your opinion.
zh: 有些人认为政府应该花钱采取措施，防止少数人使用的语言彻底灭绝。另一些人认为这是浪费财政资源。讨论两种观点并给出你的观点。

en: In many countries, more and more people are wearing western style clothes rather than more traditional clothes. Why is it? Is it positive or negative development?
zh: 在许多国家，越来越多的人穿着西式服装而不是传统服装。为什么呢？是积极发展还是消极发展？

views.claim_zh: 媒体：西式服装是主流

en: The spread of multinational companies and the resulting increase of globalization produce positive effects to everyone. Do you agree or disagree?
zh: 跨国公司的扩张以及由此带来的全球化程度的提高对每个人都产生了积极的影响。你同意还是不同意？

en: In many countries students who leave high school have no understanding of how to manage their money. What do you think are the reasons? What can be done to improve this important skill?
zh: 在许多国家，高中毕业的学生不知道如何管理自己的钱。你认为原因是什么？可以做些什么来提高这项重要的技能？

en: A recent survey shows that in many countries across the world people are generally living longer. But an increased life expectancy has many implications for the aging individuals and for the society as a whole. What are the possible effects of a longer life expectancy on individuals and the society?
zh: 最近的一项调查显示，在世界上许多国家，人们的寿命普遍较长。但是，预期寿命的延长对老年人和整个社会都有许多影响。预期寿命延长对个人和社会可能产生什么影响？

en: When we learn a foreign language, all four skills (listening, speaking, reading and writing) are equally important. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 当我们学习一门外语时，所有四项技能（听、说、读、写）都同样重要。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这种观点？

en: More and more plastic waste is polluting cities, countryside and oceans. What problems does it cause? What are the solutions?
zh: 越来越多的塑料垃圾正在污染城市、农村和海洋。它造成了什么问题？解决办法是什么？

en: Nowadays, it has become easier and more affordable for people to visit other countries. Is it a positive or negative development?
zh: 如今，人们去其他国家旅游变得更容易、更实惠了。这是一个积极的还是消极的发展？

views.claim_zh: 它会显著增加交通排放与目的地承载压力，从而加重环境负担并影响当地生活。
views.claim_en: it increases transport emissions and overwhelms popular destinations, creating heavier environmental and social costs.
views.analysis_zh:
起点A：交通排放链（飞机/船）

A1 跨国移动高度依赖飞机与邮轮/船运
A2 出行频次上升 → 燃油消耗与碳排放累积
A3 排放增加 → 空气污染与温室气体压力上升
A4 终点：环境保护难度上升、气候压力加重

起点B：过度拥挤链（景区承载）

B1 游客集中在少数热门城市/景点
B2 超过承载能力 → 垃圾增加、噪音上升、公共设施磨损
B3 管理成本飙升（清洁、限流、安保、修复）
B4 终点：生态与景观受损，城市运行压力加大

起点C：资源消耗链（水电/一次性用品）

C1 住宿和餐饮需求上升 → 水电消耗上升
C2 一次性用品与包装增多 → 垃圾处理量暴涨
C3 处理系统跟不上 → 污染扩散或外溢
C4 终点：环境负担进一步加重

起点D：对居民生活链（拥堵与价格）

D1 大量游客进入 → 交通拥堵、噪音、公共空间被挤占
D2 需求推高租金与物价（尤其在热门地区）
D3 居民生活成本上升、生活体验下降
D4 终点：当地居民反感增加，社会摩擦上升
views.analysis_en:
Start A: Transport emissions (planes/ships)

A1 International travel relies heavily on flights and cruises/ships
A2 More trips → more fuel use and accumulated emissions
A3 Higher emissions → more air pollution and greenhouse-gas pressure
A4 End: environmental protection becomes harder; climate impacts grow

Start B: Overcrowding and carrying capacity

B1 Tourists cluster in a few hotspots
B2 Capacity is exceeded → more litter, noise and wear on facilities
B3 Higher management costs (clean-up, security, repairs, crowd control)
B4 End: damaged ecosystems and stressed urban systems

Start C: Resource use and waste

C1 More accommodation and dining → higher water/energy consumption
C2 More disposable items and packaging → a surge in waste
C3 Waste systems cannot keep up → leakage and pollution
C4 End: a heavier environmental burden

Start D: Pressure on residents

D1 Large tourist inflows → congestion, noise, crowded public spaces
D2 Higher demand pushes up rent and prices
D3 Residents face higher living costs and lower quality of life
D4 End: resentment rises and social tension increases

en: Parents should encourage children to spend less time studying and more time doing physical activities. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 父母应该鼓励孩子少花时间学习，多花时间做体育活动。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: Some people believe that educational qualifications always bring success, while others disagree. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 一些人认为学历总能带来成功，而另一些人则不同意。讨论两种观点并给出你的观点。

en: Fresh water has always been a limited resource in some parts of the world. However, the demand for water is still increasing so this becomes a global problem. What are the causes of this increased demand and how can governments and individuals respond to this problem?
zh: 在世界上的一些地方，淡水一直是一种有限的资源。然而，对水的需求仍在增加，因此这成为一个全球性问题。需求增加的原因是什么？政府和个人如何应对这一问题？

en: Many animals are endangered. Some people argue that we should only protect animals that are useful to human. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 许多动物濒临灭绝。有些人认为我们应该只保护对人类有用的动物。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: In some countries around the world men and women tend to have their children later in life. Why this happened?What are the effects on society and family life?
zh: 在世界上的一些国家，男性和女性倾向于晚育。为什么会这样呢？对社会和家庭生活有什么影响？

en: Music has always been and continues to be the universal language of mankind. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 音乐一直是并将继续是人类的通用语言。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: Some people believe that if a police force carries a gun, it will encourage higher levels of violence in the whole society. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 有些人认为，如果警察部队携带枪支，会在整个社会中鼓励更高程度的暴力。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: Health experts claim that walking is the best exercise. However, people are walking less on a daily basis. What has made it happen and how to deal with this?
zh: 健康专家声称散步是最好的运动。然而，人们每天走路的时间越来越少了。是什么导致了这种情况，该如何应对呢？

en: More and more people no longer read newspaper or watch TV programs to get news. They get news about the world through the Internet. Is this a positive or negative development?
zh: 越来越多的人不再通过读报纸或看电视节目来获取新闻。他们通过互联网获取世界新闻。这是一个积极的还是消极的发展？

en: Many people believe that bicycle is a healthy and environmentally friendly mode of transport. However, it is no longer the main form of transport. What are the reasons? What could be done to encourage the use of bicycles among the wider population?
zh: 许多人认为自行车是一种健康、环保的交通方式。然而，它已不再是主要的交通方式。原因是什么呢？我们可以做些什么来鼓励更广泛的人群使用自行车？

en: Young people today do not spend their holiday and weekend doing outdoor activities like hiking and climbing in natural environment. Why is it? And how to encourage them to go out?
zh: 现在的年轻人不把假期和周末花在户外活动上，比如在自然环境中徒步旅行和爬山。为什么呢？又如何鼓励他们走出去？

en: Traditional foods are being replaced by international fast foods. It has a negative effect on families and societies. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 传统食品正在被国际快餐所取代。这对家庭和社会都有负面影响。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: Some people think in order to continually improve the quality of education, high school students should be encouraged to evaluate and criticize their teachers. Other feel that this would result in a loss of respect and discipline in classroom. Discuss both these views and give your own opinion.
zh: 一些人认为为了不断提高教育质量，应该鼓励高中生评价和批评他们的老师。另一些人则认为这会导致课堂上缺乏尊重和纪律。讨论这两种观点，并给出你自己的观点。

en: Some people think that the best way to improve road safety is to let the drivers test each year. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 一些人认为提高道路安全的最好方法是让司机每年都参加考试。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: People should take care of themselves as a duty to the society where they live in, rather than their own benefits. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 人们应该照顾好自己，这是对他们所生活的社会的责任，而不是为了自己的利益。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: Many museums and historical sites are mainly visited by tourists rather than local people. Why is this? What can be done to attract local people?
zh: 许多博物馆和历史遗迹主要是由游客而不是当地人参观的。这是为什么呢？怎么做才能吸引当地人？

en: Some people say that advertising has positive economic effects. Others think it has negative social effects because it will make people feel dissatisfied with who they are and what they have. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 有人说广告有积极的经济效应。另一些人认为它有负面的社会影响，因为它会让人们对自己和自己拥有的东西感到不满。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: Although family has powerful influence on children, influence from outside the family plays a bigger role in children’s development. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 虽然家庭对孩子有很大的影响，但家庭以外的影响对孩子的发展起着更大的作用。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: Some people believe that university education should focus on the skills of employment for the future. Others think it should focus on academic study only. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 有些人认为大学教育应该侧重于未来就业的技能。另一些人认为它应该只关注学术研究。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: More and more people are becoming overweight. Some people suggest that people should increase the prices of fattening foods. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 越来越多的人变得超重。一些人建议人们应该提高使人发胖的食品的价格。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: In education and employment, some people work harder than others. Why do some people work harder than others? Is it always a good thing to work hard?
zh: 在教育和就业方面，有些人比其他人更努力。为什么有些人比其他人更努力?努力工作总是一件好事吗？

en: Some people think it’s necessary to travel abroad to learn about other countries. However, other people think that it is not necessary to travel abroad because all the information can be seen at TV and the Internet. Discuss both opinions and give your own opinion.
zh: 有些人认为出国旅行了解其他国家是必要的。然而，另一些人认为没有必要出国旅行，因为所有的信息都可以在电视和互联网上看到。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: Maintaining publicity libraries is a waste of time since computer technology is now replacing their function. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 维护宣传图书馆是浪费时间，因为计算机技术正在取代它们的功能。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这种观点？

en: Education of young people is highly prioritized in many countries. However, educating adults who cannot read or write is more important and governments should spend more money on this. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 在许多国家，年轻人的教育被高度重视。然而，教育不会读写的成年人更为重要，政府应该在这方面投入更多资金。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: Some people claim that the main aim of advertising is to increase the sales of products that people do not really need. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 一些人认为广告的主要目的是为了增加人们并不真正需要的产品的销售。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这种观点？

en: Some people think individuals are more and more dependent on each other. Others believe we are more and more independent. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 有些人认为个人越来越依赖彼此。其他人则认为我们越来越独立了。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: Today food travel thousands of miles from the farm to the consumers. Why is this? Is it a positive or negative trend?
zh: 今天，食物从农场到消费者手中要经过数千英里的运输。这是为什么呢？是积极趋势还是消极趋势？

en: Some people think children have the freedom to make mistakes, while other people believe adults should prevent children from making mistakes. Discuss both sides and give your opinion.
zh: 有些人认为孩子有犯错的自由，而另一些人则认为成年人应该阻止孩子犯错。讨论双方的观点并给出你的观点。

en: Many developing countries are currently expanding their tourist industries. Why is this the case? Is it a positive or negative development?
zh: 许多发展中国家目前正在发展他们的旅游业。为什么会这样呢？这是一个积极的还是消极的发展？

en: Scientific research should be carried out and controlled by governments rather than private companies. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 科学研究应该由政府而不是私人公司来进行和控制。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: School leavers go traveling or work before they go directly to the university. Do the advantages outweigh the disadvantages on their study?
zh: 中学毕业生在直接进入大学之前会去旅行或工作。对他们的学习来说利大于弊吗？

en: It will be better to have wide use of driverless cars for individuals and society. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 对个人和社会来说，无人驾驶汽车的广泛使用会更好。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: The natural resources, such as oil, forests and fresh water, are being consumed at an alarming rate. What problems does it cause? How can we solve these problems?
zh: 自然资源，如石油、森林和淡水，正以惊人的速度被消耗。它造成了什么问题？我们如何解决这些问题？

en: In some countries college students live at home with their families, whereas in other countries some students go to another city for college. Do you think the advantages outweigh the disadvantages that students go to another city for college life?
zh: 在一些国家，大学生和家人住在一起，而在另一些国家，一些学生去另一个城市上大学。你认为学生去另一个城市上大学的利大于弊吗？

en: Some experts suppose that when a country is already rich, any additional increase in economic wealth does not make its citizens happier. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 一些专家认为，当一个国家已经很富裕时，经济财富的任何额外增加都不会使其公民更幸福。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这种观点？

en: People who decide on a career path early in their lives and keep to it are more likely to have a satisfying working life than those who change jobs frequently. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 那些在人生早期就决定了职业道路并坚持下去的人比那些经常换工作的人更有可能拥有令人满意的职业生涯。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这种观点？

en: Some people think that it is more beneficial to take part in sports which are played in teams, like football. But others think taking part in individual sports is better, like swimming. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 有些人认为参加像足球这样的团队运动更有益。但也有人认为参加个人运动更好，比如游泳。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: People who damage public property such as buildings and statues should have to do community service (such as cleaning parks) as a punishment rather than other forms of punishment (such as paying a fine or going to prison). To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 破坏公共财产，如建筑物和雕像的人应该做社区服务（如清洁公园）作为惩罚，而不是其他形式的惩罚（如支付罚款或入狱）。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: Developing countries require international organizations’ help. Some people think financial aid from international organizations is important, while others believe that practical aid and advice are better. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 发展中国家需要国际组织的帮助。一些人认为国际组织的经济援助很重要，而另一些人则认为实际的援助和建议更好。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: The only reason for people working hard is to earn money. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 人们努力工作的唯一原因是为了赚钱。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: Some people believe that companies (employers) should not be concerned about the way their employees dress, but they should be concerned about the quality at work. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 有些人认为公司（雇主）不应该关心员工的穿着，但他们应该关心工作的质量。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: Nowadays, some parents put a lot of pressure on their children to succeed. Why parents have the reason for doing that? Is that a positive or negative development of children?
zh: 现在，一些父母为了孩子的成功给他们很大的压力。为什么父母有这样做的理由？这对孩子的发展是积极的还是消极的？

en: Many people use social media every day to get in touch with other people and news events. Do you think the advantages of this way outweigh the disadvantages?
zh: 很多人每天都用社交媒体来联系其他人和新闻事件。你认为这种方式的优点大于缺点吗？

views.claim_zh: 使用社交媒体可能会增加隐私泄露风险
views.claim_en: The use of social media may increase the risk of privacy invasion.
views.analysis_zh:
使用社交网站
→ 必须先注册（required/forced to register）
→ 不得不填写个人信息（real name / ID number / phone number…）
→ 平台公司收集并保存这些数据
→ 风险 1：公司或员工可能为获利泄露信息
→ 风险 2：即使公司不泄露，黑客也可能窃取并外泄
→ 结论：社交媒体增加隐私泄露风险


使用社交媒体可能会增加隐私被侵犯的风险。首先，用户在使用大多数社交网站前通常必须注册，这意味着他们不得不提供个人信息。因此，真实姓名、身份证号、电话号码等敏感信息会被平台公司收集并保存。这样一来就产生风险：公司或员工可能为了获利而泄露用户数据。除此之外，即使公司本身不泄露，这些信息也仍可能被黑客窃取并公开传播。因此，我认为社交媒体的普及会导致隐私泄露问题。
views.analysis_en:
Explain（解释+具象化）
To begin with, users are typically required to register before using most social networking sites, meaning that they have to provide personal details. As a result, sensitive information such as their real name, ID number and phone number may be collected and stored by the companies running these platforms.

Develop（展开两条风险路径）
This creates a potential threat because the companies or their staff may leak users’ data for profit. Additionally, even if the companies themselves do not disclose such information, it can still be stolen and leaked by hackers.

Link（回扣观点）
Therefore, I believe that the growing use of social media can lead to privacy breaches.

en: Professional workers like doctors, nurses and teachers make a greater contribution to the society, so they should be paid more than sports and entertainment personalities. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 像医生、护士和教师这样的专业工作者对社会做出了更大的贡献，所以他们应该比体育和娱乐名人得到更多的报酬。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: The best way to deal with traffic and transportation problem is to encourage people to live in the cities rather than suburbs and countryside. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 处理交通和运输问题的最好方法是鼓励人们住在城市而不是郊区和农村。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: Some people think that school and government should take responsibilities to transport children to school. While some people think that parents should get children to school. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 一些人认为学校和政府应该承担接送孩子上学的责任。而有些人认为父母应该送孩子上学。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: The key to solving environmental problems is simple: present generations must be willing to accept less comfortable life for the sake for future generations. Do you agree or disagree?
zh: 解决环境问题的关键很简单：为了子孙后代，当代人必须愿意接受不那么舒适的生活。同意还是不同意？

en: Some people think that the environmental problems are too big for individuals to solve. Others, however, believe that the problems cannot be solved if individuals do not take some action. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 有些人认为环境问题太大了，个人无法解决。然而，另一些人认为，如果个人不采取行动，这些问题就无法解决。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

views.claim_zh:
个人和政府（政客）相互甩锅 推卸责任

1.个人甩锅给政府：商店里都是塑料袋

2. 政府甩锅给个人： 商店里有环保的袋子，但是人们不去选

en: Many people like to eat unhealthy food even though they know it's bad for themselves. Why do people do that? What effective way can improve people's healthy eating habits?
zh: 许多人喜欢吃不健康的食物，即使他们知道这对他们有害。为什么人们会这样做呢？有什么有效的方法可以改善人们健康的饮食习惯？

en: Some people believe that university students should pay all the cost of studies because university education only benefits students themselves not the society as a whole. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 一些人认为大学生应该支付所有的学习费用，因为大学教育只使学生自己受益，而不是整个社会。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: Since people can study through the internet, schools have become unnecessary. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 由于人们可以通过互联网学习，学校就变得没有必要了。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: Some people agree that the best way to become successful in life is to get a university education. Others disagree with it and reckon that nowadays it is no longer true. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 有些人同意在生活中取得成功的最好方法是接受大学教育。另一些人不同意这种观点，认为现在这已经不正确了。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

views.claim_zh:
XYZ 关系：successful 和 get a university education 的关系
successful（宏观 --> 文章重心） 的 原因：
many argue that success does have something to do with attending college
some people may view career sucess as their top priority, and getting through college is what they'll have to do to get there.

思路1：他们和上面的人对成功的定义不同，他们认为的成功和读大学没有关系
思路2：他们和上面的人对成功定义相同，但是他们认为读大学不是最好的方法


人生的每个阶段对成功的定义不同，所以我认为跟是否读大学没有直接的联系

en: Nowadays, many people use social media every day to get in touch with other people and news events. Do you think the advantages of this way outweigh the disadvantages?
zh: 如今，许多人每天都使用社交媒体与他人和新闻事件保持联系。你认为这种方式的优点大于缺点吗？

en: Some people think in order to continually improve the quality of education, high school students should be encouraged to evaluate and criticize their teachers. Other feel that this would result in a loss of respect and discipline in classroom. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 一些人认为为了不断提高教育质量，应该鼓励高中生评价和批评他们的老师。另一些人则认为这会导致课堂上缺乏尊重和纪律。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: In many countries, children are becoming overweight and unhealthy. Some people think that the government should have the responsibility. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 在许多国家，儿童正在变得超重和不健康。一些人认为政府应该对此负责。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: In some countries old people who retire from work spend the money on themselves(e.g. holiday) rather than save money for their children. Is it a positive or negative development?
zh: 在一些国家，退休的老人把钱花在自己身上。度假而不是为他们的孩子存钱。这是一种积极还是消极的发展？

en: Some countries invest more money to make it easier to use bicycles in cities. Why? Is it the best way to solve the transport problems?
zh: 一些国家投入了更多的资金，使自行车在城市里更容易使用。为什么?这是解决交通问题的最好办法吗？

en: More and more people no longer read newspaper or watch TV programs to get news. They get news about the world through the internet. Is this a positive or negative development?
zh: 越来越多的人不再通过读报纸或看电视节目来获取新闻。他们通过互联网获取世界新闻。这是一个积极的还是消极的发展？

en: Students easily access information online, so libraries are no longer necessary. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 学生们很容易在网上获取信息，所以图书馆不再是必要的。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: More people put their private and personal information online in everyday activities (such as banking ,shopping and socializing),do you think this is a positive or negative development?
zh: 越来越多的人在日常活动中（比如银行、购物和社交）把自己的私人和个人信息放到网上，你认为这是一个积极的还是消极的发展？

en: People who live in the twenty-first century have a better quality of life than people who live in previous centuries. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 生活在21世纪的人比生活在前几个世纪的人有更好的生活质量。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: Many cities replace farmlands and parks with houses. Is it a positive or negative development?
zh: 许多城市用房屋取代农田和公园。这是一个积极的还是消极的发展？

en: The shortage of housing in big cities can cause severe consequences and only the government action can solve the problem. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 大城市住房短缺会造成严重的后果，只有政府的行动才能解决这个问题。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: In the past, people ate local foods in season. Nowadays, people buy a variety of food from all over the world. Do the advantages outweigh the disadvantages?
zh: 在过去，人们吃当地应季的食物。现在，人们从世界各地购买各种各样的食物。利大于弊吗？

en: More and more people could now access information from computers and other electronic devices. Therefore, there is no need to use printed books, magazines or newspapers on paper. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 现在越来越多的人可以从电脑和其他电子设备上获取信息。因此，没有必要使用纸质的书籍、杂志或报纸。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这种观点？

en: In many countries today, too much money is spent by the government and individuals on national celebration such as New Year and religious festival. Why might this be the case? Is it a positive or negative development?
zh: 在今天的许多国家，政府和个人在全国性的庆祝活动上花费了太多的钱，比如新年和宗教节日。为什么会出现这种情况呢？这是积极的还是消极的发展？

en: In many cities, planners tend to arrange shops, schools, offices and homes in specific areas and separate them from each other. Do you think the advantages of this policy outweigh the disadvantages?
zh: 在许多城市，规划者倾向于将商店、学校、办公室和住宅安排在特定的区域，并将它们彼此分开。你认为这个政策的利大于弊吗？

views.claim_zh: 弊大于利 不方便 拥堵
不良竞争

en: In many countries, people spend more and more time away from their families. What causes this trend? What effect do you think it has on themselves and their families?
zh: 在许多国家，人们离开家人的时间越来越长。是什么导致了这种趋势？你认为这对他们自己和他们的家庭有什么影响？

en: Some people think that it is a better way to leave their home country to improve their work and living opportunities, while others think that staying in their own country is a better choice. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 有些人认为离开祖国是更好的方式来改善他们的工作和生活机会，而另一些人则认为留在自己的国家是更好的选择。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: Some people believe using modern technology (digital photographs, blogs) is the best way to record and remember important personal events. Others think the traditional method (making photo albums, writing diaries) is better. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 有些人认为使用现代技术（数码照片、博客）是记录和记住重要个人事件的最好方式。另一些人认为传统的方法（制作相册、写日记）更好。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: It is suggested that everyone in the world should have a car, a TV and a fridge. Do you think the disadvantages outweigh the advantages for the society?
zh: 建议世界上每个人都应该有一辆车，一台电视和一台冰箱。你认为对社会来说弊大于利吗？

en: the use of cars and motorcycles cause transportation difficulties in cities. Why do people continue to use cars and motorcycles in cities? What is the best way to solve this problem?
zh: 汽车和摩托车的使用给城市交通带来了困难。为什么人们还在城市里继续使用汽车和摩托车？解决这个问题的最好办法是什么？

en: It is more important for school children to learn about their local history than the world history. Do you agree or disagree?
zh: 对小学生来说，学习当地历史比学习世界历史更重要。你同意还是不同意？

en: Today people live longer after retiring from work. What problems does this cause for individuals and society? What can be done?
zh: 今天，人们退休后寿命更长。这给个人和社会带来了什么问题？可以做些什么？

en: Some people think the main purpose of school is to turn children into good citizens and workers, rather than to benefit them as individuals. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 一些人认为学校的主要目的是把孩子们培养成好的公民和工人，而不是让他们作为个人受益。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: With the increase demand for energy such as oil and gas, people start to look for their sources in remote and untouched places. Do the advantages outweigh the disadvantages?
zh: 随着对石油和天然气等能源需求的增加，人们开始在偏远和未被触及的地方寻找能源。利大于弊吗？

en: Good teaching is more important for academic success than individual ability. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 良好的教学对学业成功比个人能力更重要。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: Nowadays, it is difficult for people living in cities to get enough physical exercise. What are the reasons? How can this problem be solved?
zh: 现在，生活在城市里的人们很难得到足够的体育锻炼。原因是什么？如何解决这个问题？

en: Some believe that the Olympic games help bring people from different nations together, while others claim that holding the Olympics wastes money that could be used for other important issues. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 一些人认为奥运会有助于将不同国家的人们聚集在一起，而另一些人则认为举办奥运会浪费了可以用于其他重要问题的钱。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: More and more people move from the countryside to big cities. Does this development bring more advantages or disadvantages to the environment?
zh: 越来越多的人从农村搬到大城市。这种发展对环境是有利还是不利？

en: In more and more countries, people choose to give money on special occasions rather than giving gifts chosen personally. Why might this be the case? Is it a positive or a negative development?
zh: 在越来越多的国家，人们选择在特殊场合给钱，而不是送自己选择的礼物。为什么会出现这种情况呢？这是积极的还是消极的发展？

en: Some people think visual images（like photographs, videos) can tell information more accurately in a news story, while others think they cannot represent the full story. Discuss both views and give your opinion.
zh: 一些人认为视觉图像（如照片、视频）可以在新闻报道中更准确地讲述信息，而另一些人则认为它们不能代表整个故事。讨论两种观点并给出你的观点。

en: The increase in the production of consumer goods results in damage to the natural environment. What are the causes of this? What can be done to solve this problem?
zh: 消费品生产的增加导致了对自然环境的破坏。造成这种情况的原因是什么？如何解决这个问题？

views.claim_zh:
消费品生产的增加的原因，而不是自然环境破坏的原因
人口增长
资本

en: Some people think that the increasing use of computers and mobile phones for communication has a negative effect on young people’s reading and writing skills. Do you agree or disagree?
zh: 一些人认为越来越多地使用电脑和手机进行交流对年轻人的阅读和写作技能有负面影响。你同意还是不同意？

en: Some people think that governments should ban dangerous sports, but others think people should have freedom to do any sports or activities. Discuss both views and give your opinion.
zh: 有些人认为政府应该禁止危险的运动，但其他人认为人们应该有自由做任何运动或活动。讨论两种观点并给出你的观点。

en: Some college freshmen find that the courses they choose are not suitable for them. What are the causes of this? What can be done to solve the problem?
zh: 一些大学新生发现他们选择的课程不适合他们。造成这种情况的原因是什么呢？有什么办法可以解决这个问题？

en: People’s shopping habits depend more on the age group they belong to than any other factor. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 人们的购物习惯更多地取决于他们所属的年龄组，而不是其他因素。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: in some countries, small town-center shops are going out of business because people tend to drive to large out-of-town stores. As a result, people without cars have limited access to out-of-town stores, and it may result in an increase in the use of cars. Do you think the disadvantages of this change outweigh its advantages?
zh: 在一些国家，市中心的小商店正在倒闭，因为人们倾向于开车去城外的大商店。因此，没有车的人去城外商店的机会有限，这可能会导致汽车使用量的增加。你认为这种变化的缺点大于优点吗？

views.claim_zh: 人们倾向于开车去城外的大商店的利弊。城外大型商店的主要优点在于：商品选择更多、总体更省钱。
views.claim_en: The main advantages are greater product choice and cost savings.
views.analysis_zh:
起点A：大型商店面积更大、供货集中
→ 能同时上架更多品牌/规格/价位（从平价到高端）
→ 消费者更容易“横向比较”（质量、功能、价格）
→ 终点：更容易买到最符合需求的产品（选择更匹配）

起点B：品类齐全（食品+日用品+家电等）
→ 一次出行能解决多种需求
→ 减少“跑多家店还买不齐”的情况
→ 终点：选择范围更广且更便利

起点A：规模效应（大量进货+周转快）
→ 单位采购/仓储/运营成本更低
→ 商家更容易打折、做捆绑价、长期低价
→ 终点：日常开支下降（尤其食品日用品）

起点B：一站式采购减少额外成本
→ 少跑多家店（减少时间成本与小额重复开销）
→ 更容易计划“集中采购”避免临时高价购买
→ 终点：总体消费更可控、更省钱
views.analysis_en:
Start A: Larger floor space + centralised supply
→ more brands, sizes and price ranges on shelves
→ easier side-by-side comparison
→ End: better matching between products and needs

Start B: Wider categories in one place
→ one trip covers multiple needs
→ fewer situations where people “can’t find what they need” locally
→ End: broader and more convenient choice

Start A: Economies of scale (bulk purchasing, high turnover)
→ lower per-unit costs
→ more frequent discounts and lower baseline prices
→ End: lower spending on everyday essentials

Start B: One-stop shopping reduces extra costs
→ fewer separate trips and less repeated small spending
→ easier to plan and avoid last-minute expensive purchases
→ End: more controllable and cheaper overall shopping

views.claim_zh: 当市中心小店倒闭、资源转移到城外，无车人群的生活可达性下降，社会被迫更依赖汽车，从而带来不公平与更多用车。
views.claim_en: as town-centre shops disappear and retail shifts outward, non-drivers lose access and society becomes more car-dependent, creating inequity and higher car use.
views.analysis_zh:
起点A：中心小店倒闭 → “步行可达”的供给消失
→ 无车者（老人、青少年、低收入者）买日用品更困难
→ 只能依赖他人接送/昂贵打车/减少购买频次
→ 终点：基本生活被“交通能力”绑架，公平性下降

起点B：可达性差 → 诱发“被迫购车/更多用车”
→ 家庭为了获取廉价与齐全商品开始考虑买车
→ 或者原本有车的家庭增加开车频次（代买、集中采购）
→ 终点：汽车使用量上升（题干给的核心后果）

起点C：车依赖上升 → 外部成本扩大
→ 更多行驶带来拥堵、停车占地、尾气排放
→ 市中心人流进一步减少，小店更难生存（负循环）
→ 终点：城镇活力衰退 + 环境与交通压力更大
views.analysis_en:
Start A: Town-centre closures remove walkable access
→ non-drivers (elderly, teens, low-income) struggle to buy essentials
→ reliance on others, costly taxis, or fewer shopping trips
→ End: basic needs become tied to car ownership; inequality rises

Start B: Limited access pushes car reliance
→ some households feel forced to buy a car to reach cheaper, wider options
→ or car-owning households drive more often (shopping for others, bulk trips)
→ End: increased car use (the key outcome in the prompt)

Start C: More driving creates wider costs
→ congestion, parking pressure, and emissions increase
→ fewer people visit town centres, making small shops even less viable (a loop)
→ End: weaker town-centre vitality plus higher environmental/traffic burdens

en: Some people think that robots are very important for humans' future development. Others, however, think that robots are a dangerous invention that could have negative effects on society. Discuss both views and give your opinion.
zh: 一些人认为机器人对人类未来的发展非常重要。然而，另一些人认为机器人是一种危险的发明，可能会对社会产生负面影响。讨论两种观点并给出你的观点。

en: Too much money is spent in maintaining and repairing old buildings. Some people think that they should be knocked down and give way to the modern buildings. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 太多的钱花在维护和修理旧建筑上。一些人认为应该拆除旧建筑，让位于现代建筑。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点?

en: Nowadays, people live in the society where consumer goods are relatively cheaper to buy. Do you think advantages outweigh its disadvantages?
zh: 如今，人们生活在一个消费品相对便宜的社会。你认为利大于弊吗？

en: The level of noise around us is constantly increasing and is affecting the quality of our lives. What causes the noise? What should be done about it?
zh: 我们周围的噪音不断增加，影响着我们的生活质量。噪音是由什么引起的？应该怎么做呢？

en: Everyone should stay in school until they reach the age of 18. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 每个人都应该留在学校，直到他们达到18岁。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: Men and women have different qualities. Therefore, some people think some certain jobs are suitable for men and some jobs are suitable for women. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 男人和女人有不同的品质。因此，有些人认为有些工作适合男性，有些工作适合女性。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: Some people think secondary/high school students should be allowed to choose academic courses leading to universities or practical courses leading to careers such as carpenters. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 有些人认为应该允许中学生选择通往大学的学术课程或通往职业的实用课程，如木匠。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: Some people think products should be made to last as long as possible, while others think making products cheap is more important. Discuss both views and give your opinion.
zh: 有些人认为产品应该做得越耐用越好，而另一些人则认为让产品便宜更重要。讨论两种观点并给出你的观点。

en: Some people think watching television is bad for children in every way. Others think it is good for children to get knowledge. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 有些人认为看电视在各个方面对孩子都不好。另一些人认为看电视对孩子获得知识有好处。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: Museums and art galleries should concentrate on local works rather than showing the cultures or artworks from other countries. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 博物馆和美术馆应该把重点放在本地作品上，而不是展示来自其他国家的文化或艺术品。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这种观点？

en: Some people think that there could be more benefits to society if more people study business than history. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 有些人认为，如果更多的人学习商业而不是历史，对社会会有更多的好处。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: Throughout the history, people dream to build a perfect society while they haven't agreed how the ideal society would be like. What is the most important element you think to make a perfect society? How do people do to achieve an ideal society?
zh: 纵观历史，人们梦想建立一个完美的社会，但他们并没有同意理想的社会是什么样的。你认为建立一个完美社会最重要的因素是什么？人们如何实现一个理想的社会？

en: Nowadays, some consumers are less influenced by advertising than in the past. What are the reasons? Is it a positive or negative development?
zh: 现在，一些消费者不像过去那样受广告的影响了。原因是什么？这是积极的还是消极的发展？

en: Recent study shows that the majority of the criminals who are sent into the prison continue to commit crime after they are set free. What do you think in this case? What should be done to solve this problem?
zh: 最近的研究表明，大多数被送进监狱的罪犯在释放后继续犯罪。你对这种情况怎么看？应该做些什么来解决这个问题？

en: Organized tours to remote places and communities are increasingly popular. Is it a positive or negative development for local people and the local environment?
zh: 有组织的偏远地区和社区旅游越来越受欢迎。对当地人和当地环境来说，这是一种积极还是消极的发展？

en: Some people think they have right to use as much fresh water as they want, but others believe government should control the use of fresh water as it is limited resources. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 有些人认为他们有权随心所欲地使用淡水，但其他人认为政府应该控制淡水的使用，因为淡水是有限的资源。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: Large companies should pay higher salaries to CEOs and executives compared with other workers. To what extent do you agree or disagree? (hierarchy)
zh: 大公司应该向ceo和高管支付比其他员工更高的薪水。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？(层次)

en: Some people think the government should pay for health care and education, but others believe that it is not the government’s responsibility. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 一些人认为政府应该为医疗和教育买单，但另一些人认为这不是政府的责任。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: Employers should give their staffs at least 4-week holiday a year as employees can be better at work. To what extent do you agree or disagree with this opinion?
zh: 雇主应该给他们的员工每年至少4周的假期，因为员工可以更好地工作。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: Some people think that history provides little or nothing to tell us, while others think that history can help us better understand the present. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 有些人认为历史几乎没有告诉我们什么，而另一些人则认为历史可以帮助我们更好地理解现在。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: Some people think that older school children should learn a wide range of subjects and develop knowledge, while other people think that they should only learn a small number of subjects in detail. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 一些人认为大龄学生应该学习广泛的科目和发展知识，而另一些人认为他们应该只学习少数科目的细节。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: Some people think watching television is bad for children. Others think it is good for developing children as they grow up. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 有些人认为看电视对孩子不好。另一些人认为看电视对孩子的成长有好处。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: Despite better access to education, many adults today still cannot read and write. In what ways are they disadvantaged? What can governments do to help them?
zh: 尽管有更好的受教育机会，但今天许多成年人仍然不会读写。他们在哪些方面处于劣势？政府能做些什么来帮助他们？

en: Some people think hosting major international sporting events brings a lot of advantages to a country, while others believe there are more disadvantages. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 有些人认为举办大型国际体育赛事给一个国家带来了很多好处，而另一些人则认为有更多的缺点。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: Some people think that paying taxes is a big enough contribution to their society, while others think that people have more responsibilities as members of society than only paying taxes. Discuss both views and give your opinion.
zh: 有些人认为纳税对社会的贡献已经足够大了，而另一些人则认为，作为社会成员，人们有更多的责任，而不仅仅是纳税。讨论两种观点并给出你的观点。

en: Nowadays, most countries improve the standard of living through economic development. But some social values are lost as a result. Do you think the advantages of the phenomenon outweigh the disadvantages?
zh: 如今，大多数国家通过经济发展提高了人民的生活水平。但是一些社会价值也因此丧失了。你认为这种现象的利大于弊吗？

en: It was predicted with the development of technology, people in the 21st century would have much more free time than in the past. To what extent has this prediction come true?
zh: 据预测，随着科技的发展，21世纪的人们将比过去有更多的空闲时间。这个预言在多大程度上实现了？

en: Some people think that the government should provide assistance to all kinds of artists including painters, musicians, and poets. However, other people think that this is a waste of money. Discuss both views and give your opinion.
zh: 一些人认为政府应该为各种艺术家提供帮助，包括画家、音乐家和诗人。然而，另一些人认为这是浪费钱。讨论两种观点并给出你的观点。

en: Nowadays celebrities are more known for their glamour and wealth than for their achievements, and this sets a bad example to young people. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 如今，名人更多的是因他们的魅力和财富而不是他们的成就而闻名，这给年轻人树立了一个不好的榜样。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这种观点？

en: Countries with a long average working time are more economically successful, but they are also likely to suffer from negative social consequences. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 平均工作时间长的国家在经济上更成功，但它们也可能遭受负面的社会后果。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这种观点？

en: Some people say that professional workers such as doctors, nurses and teachers who make greater contributions to the society should be paid more than those people in the field of sports and entertainment. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 有人说专业工作者，如医生、护士和教师，他们对社会的贡献更大，应该比那些在体育和娱乐领域的人得到更多的报酬。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: Doctors recommend that older people exercise regularly. However, many older people do not exercise enough. What could be the reason for this? What can be done to encourage them to do physical activities?
zh: 医生建议老年人要经常锻炼。然而，很多老年人运动量不够。这其中的原因是什么呢？我们可以做些什么来鼓励他们进行体育活动？

en: Some people think we should keep all the money we earn and not pay tax to the state. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 有些人认为我们应该把赚来的钱都留着，不向国家纳税。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: Many ex-prisoners continue to commit crimes even after being punished for it. Why do you think this happens? How can we solve the problems?
zh: 许多刑满释放的人甚至在受到惩罚后还继续犯罪。你认为为什么会发生这种情况？我们如何解决这些问题？

en: Some people think that secondary school students should study international news as a school subject, but others argue that it would be a waste of valuable school time. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 一些人认为中学生应该把国际新闻作为一门课程来学习，但另一些人则认为这是浪费宝贵的学习时间。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: With the rapid development of communication technology, such as smart phones, tablets, and other mobile devices, some people think the disadvantages outweigh its advantages. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 随着通信技术的快速发展，如智能手机、平板电脑和其他移动设备，一些人认为缺点大于优点。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: If people go to live in another country, they should follow the local customs and traditions. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 如果人们去另一个国家生活，他们应该遵守当地的习俗和传统。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: Currently, many people fail to balance the work with the other parts of lives. What are the reasons and how to solve it?
zh: 目前，许多人无法平衡工作与生活的其他部分。原因是什么？如何解决？

en: Some people think that the best way to improve road safety is to increase the minimum legal age for driving cars and motorcycles. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 一些人认为提高道路安全的最好方法是提高驾驶汽车和摩托车的最低法定年龄。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: In many different countries, most shops and products become the same. Some people think that it is a positive development, while others think that it is a negative development. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 在许多不同的国家，大多数商店和产品变得一样。一些人认为这是一个积极的发展，而另一些人则认为这是一个消极的发展。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: In some countries, there is not enough recycling of waste material (e.g. paper, glass, and cans). What are the reasons and what can be done to solve the problem?
zh: 在一些国家，没有足够的废物回收（如纸，玻璃和罐头）。原因是什么？可以做些什么来解决这个问题？

views.claim_zh:
垃圾回收站少
技术不成熟

en: Some people believe that young people who commit serious crimes, such as robbery or violent attack, should be punished in the same way as adults. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 一些人认为，年轻人犯了严重的罪行，如抢劫或暴力袭击，应该像成年人一样受到惩罚。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

views.claim_zh: 公正
减少犯罪

en: Some people think that more public money should be spent on roads and motorways than on public systems. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 一些人认为更多的公共资金应该花在道路和高速公路上，而不是公共系统上。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: As housing is a basic need for people, the government should provide free housing for everyone who cannot afford it. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 由于住房是人们的基本需求，政府应该为每个负担不起住房的人提供免费住房。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: Some people believe that the purpose of education is to prepare individuals to be useful to the society, while others think that the purpose is to help individuals to achieve personal ambitions. Discuss both these views and give your own opinion.
zh: 有些人认为教育的目的是使个人对社会有用，而另一些人则认为教育的目的是帮助个人实现个人抱负。讨论这两种观点，并给出你的观点。

en: It has been suggested that all young adults should be required to undertake a period of unpaid work helping people in the community. Would the drawbacks of such a requirement be greater than the benefits to the community and the individual young adults?
zh: 有人建议所有的年轻人都应该被要求从事一段时间的无偿工作，帮助社区里的人。这种要求的弊端会大于对社区和年轻人个人的好处吗？

en: Extreme sports such as skydiving and skiing are very dangerous and should be banned. To what extent do you agree or disagree with this view?
zh: 极限运动如跳伞和滑雪是非常危险的，应该被禁止。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这种观点？

en: Some people argue that cell phones should be banned in public places. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 有些人认为在公共场所应该禁止使用手机。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: Scientific research should be carried out and controlled by governments rather than private companies. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 科学研究应该由政府而不是私人公司来进行和控制。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: Some people think that printed books are no longer needed in a digital era because all writing can be stored electronically. Others think that printed books will still play an important role. Discuss both and give your own opinion.
zh: 有些人认为在数字时代不再需要印刷书籍，因为所有的文字都可以电子存储。另一些人认为印刷书籍仍将发挥重要作用。讨论两者并给出你自己的观点。

en: In many countries, people now wear western-style dresses such as suits and jeans rather than traditional clothing. Why is this? Is this a positive or negative development?
zh: 在许多国家，人们现在穿西装和牛仔裤等西式服装，而不是传统服装。为什么呢？这是一个积极的还是消极的发展？

en: Some people think all lawbreakers should be sent to prison, while others think there are better alternatives for those whose crimes are minor, such as making them do work for the local community. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 有些人认为所有的违法者都应该被送进监狱，而另一些人则认为对那些罪行轻微的人有更好的选择，比如让他们为当地社区工作。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: Many people think that most of the urgent problems can only be solved by international cooperation. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 许多人认为大多数紧迫的问题只能通过国际合作来解决。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: More and more people buy and use their own cars. Do you think the advantages of this trend for individuals outweigh the disadvantages for the environment?
zh: 越来越多的人购买和使用自己的汽车。你认为这种趋势对个人来说利大于弊吗？

views.claim_zh: 使用私家车可能会破坏环境
views.claim_en: The use of private cars may damage the environment
views.analysis_zh: 私家车使用 ↑ → 尾气排放 ↑（锚点）→ 空气污染/温室气体 ↑ → 环境受损（回扣观点）

en: Directors and managers of organisations are often older people. Some people say that it is better for younger people to be leaders. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 组织的主管和经理往往是老年人。有些人说年轻人做领导更好。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: Some people think that the best way to be successful in life is to get a university education. Others disagree and say that nowadays, this is no longer true. Discuss both views and give your own opinions.
zh: 有些人认为在生活中取得成功的最好方法是接受大学教育。另一些人不同意，他们说，现在，这不再是正确的。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: In modern society, ambition is more and more important. How important is ambition for being successful in life? Is it a positive or negative characteristic?
zh: 在现代社会，野心越来越重要。野心对于人生的成功有多重要？它是一个积极的还是消极的特征？

en: Some people think children should do organized activities in their free time. Others say that children should be free to choose what they do in their free time. Discuss both views and give your opinion.
zh: 一些人认为孩子们应该在空闲时间参加一些有组织的活动。另一些人说孩子们应该自由选择他们在空闲时间做什么。讨论两种观点并给出你的观点。

en: Some people think that it is a waste of time for an individual to plan for the future and it is more important to focus on the present. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 有些人认为对个人来说，计划未来是浪费时间，关注现在更重要。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: Some people think a job not only provides income but also social life. Others think it is better to develop a social life with people you do not work with. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 有些人认为工作不仅提供收入，还提供社交生活。另一些人则认为最好和工作以外的人发展社交生活。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

views.claim_zh:
工作和社交生活的关系
雇员看到了自己和自己的同事成为了朋友
男男

公司老板怕雇员成为朋友集体跳槽，聊天聊八卦浪费时间降低效率
上下级包庇

en: Some people say that what children watch on TV influences their behavior while others say the amount of time children spend watching TV influences their behavior. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 有些人说孩子看什么TV会影响他们的行为，而另一些人说孩子花在看TV上的时间会影响他们的行为。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: Some people say that artworks (e.g. painting, music, poetry) can be created by everybody, whereas others say they can only be made by those with special ability. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 有些人说艺术作品（如绘画，音乐，诗歌）可以由每个人创造，而另一些人说它们只能由那些有特殊能力的人创造。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: Some cities have vehicle-free days, when private cars, trucks, motorcycles are banned in the city centre. Public transportation like buses, taxis and metros are advised. To what extent do you think the advantages outweigh the disadvantages?
zh: 一些城市有无车日，私家车、卡车、摩托车禁止在市中心行驶。建议使用公共交通工具，如公共汽车、出租车和地铁。你认为在多大程度上利大于弊？

en: Some people think success of life is based on hard work and determination but others think there are more important factors like money and appearance. Discuss both sides and give your own opinion.
zh: 一些人认为人生的成功是基于努力和决心，但另一些人认为有更重要的因素，如金钱和外表。讨论双方并给出你自己的观点。

en: Not enough students choose science subjects in university in many countries. What are the reasons? What are the effects on the society?
zh: 在许多国家，没有足够的学生在大学里选择理科。原因是什么？对社会的影响是什么？

views.claim_zh: 难就业（就业前景不好）

en: In many countries students who leave high school have no understanding of how to manage their money. What do you think are the reasons? What can be done to improve this important skill?
zh: 在许多国家，高中毕业的学生不知道如何管理自己的钱。你认为原因是什么？可以做些什么来提高这项重要的技能？

en: Some people say that advertising has positive economic effects. Others think it has negative social effects because it will make people feel dissatisfied with who they are and what they have. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 有人说广告有积极的经济效应。另一些人认为它有负面的社会影响，因为它会让人们对自己和自己拥有的东西感到不满。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: Some think most crime is the result of circumstances e.g. poverty and other social problems. Others believe that most crime is caused by people who are bad by nature. Discuss both sides and give your own opinion.
zh: 有些人认为大多数犯罪是环境的结果，例如贫穷和其他社会问题。另一些人则认为大多数犯罪是由本性恶劣的人造成的。讨论双方的观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: Somme people think technological development can reduce crime, while others think it actually encourages crime. Discuss both these views and give your own opinion.
zh: 一些人认为技术发展可以减少犯罪，而另一些人认为它实际上鼓励了犯罪。讨论这两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: In the past, important knowledge about culture and history was stored in museums. Nowadays, information is freely available on the Internet; therefore, there is no longer any need for museums. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 在过去，关于文化和历史的重要知识都储存在博物馆里。如今，信息可以在互联网上免费获取；因此，再也不需要博物馆了。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: The international community must act immediately to ensure that all countries reduce their consumption of fossil fuels such as gas and oil. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 国际社会必须立即采取行动，确保所有国家减少对天然气和石油等化石燃料的消费。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: Mobile phones and the internet are very useful.However, it is rare for old people to use them. In what ways can mobile phones and the internet be useful to the old people? What could be done to encourage the old people to use mobile phones and the internet?
zh: 手机和互联网很有用。然而，老年人很少使用它们。手机和互联网在哪些方面对老年人有用？我们可以做些什么来鼓励老年人使用手机和互联网？

en: It is impossible to help all people around the world in need so governments should focus on people from their own country. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 帮助世界上所有需要帮助的人是不可能的，所以政府应该把重点放在自己国家的人身上。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: Some people think good health is a basic human right, and medical service should not be run by profit-making companies. Do advantages of private healthcare outweigh its disadvantages?
zh: 有些人认为身体健康是一项基本人权，医疗服务不应该由营利性公司经营。私立医疗的利大于弊吗？

en: Some people think the increasing business and cultural contact between countries brings many positive effects. Others say it causes the loss of national identities. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 一些人认为国与国之间日益增多的商业和文化交流带来了许多积极的影响。另一些人则认为这会导致民族认同的丧失。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: It is a natural process for animal species to become extinct (e.g. Dinosaurs and dodos). This is no reason for people to prevent them from this happening. Do you agree or disagree?
zh: 动物物种灭绝是一个自然的过程（例如恐龙和渡渡鸟）。这不是人们阻止它们发生的理由。你同意还是不同意？

en: Some people think that in modern society individuals are becoming more dependent on each other. But others say that individuals are becoming more independent on each other. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 一些人认为，在现代社会，个人变得越来越相互依赖。但也有人说，个人变得越来越相互独立。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: Some people believe that the increasing use of the computers and the mobile phones has a negative effect on young people’s reading and writing skill. Do you agree or disagree?
zh: 一些人认为电脑和手机的日益使用对年轻人的阅读和写作能力有负面影响。你同意还是不同意？

en: Many employees may work from home with modern technology. Some people claim that it benefits only workers,but not employers. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 许多员工可能使用现代技术在家工作。有些人认为这只对员工有利，对雇主没有好处。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: Some students choose to work or travel after leaving school and before going to university. Many people, however, say that working experience is more useful in adult life than traveling. Do you agree or disagree with this statement?
zh: 一些学生选择在离开学校和上大学之前工作或旅行。然而，许多人认为工作经验比旅行对成年后的生活更有用。你同意还是不同意这种说法？

en: Nowadays, more and more people decide to have children later in their life. What are the reasons? Do the advantages of this outweigh disadvantages?
zh: 现在，越来越多的人决定晚育。原因是什么？这样做的利大于弊吗？

en: It is a good thing for people in senior management positions to get a higher salary than other workers in the same company. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 处于高级管理职位的人比同一公司的其他工人获得更高的薪水是一件好事。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: Some people say government should give priorities to health care, while others believe that taxpayers’ money should be sent on other important priorities. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 一些人认为政府应该优先考虑医疗保健，而另一些人则认为纳税人的钱应该花在其他重要的事情上。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: The only reason for people working hard is to earn money. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 人们努力工作的唯一原因是为了赚钱。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: In order to learn the way other people in the world live, it is better to look at film and video records than written documents. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 为了了解世界上其他人的生活方式，最好是看电影和视频记录，而不是书面文件。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: It is a good idea for people to continue working in an old age, if it is possible for them to do so. Do you agree or disagree?
zh: 如果可能的话，人们在年老时继续工作是一个好主意。你同意还是不同意？

en: Historical objects and artifacts should be brought back to their country of origin. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 历史文物应该被带回到它们的原产国。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

views.claim_zh:
动作：归还文物 --> 分析利弊
利：可以改善两国的关系
弊：有可能归还后保存保护不了
同意

en: Some countries spend a lot of money on making it easier to use bicycles in cities. Why is this the case? Is this the best way to solve traffic problems?
zh: 一些国家花了很多钱让城市里的自行车更方便使用。为什么会这样呢？这是解决交通问题的最好办法吗？

en: Many students find it harder to study when they are at the university or college than when they are at school. Why is this? What can be done to solve the problem?
zh: 许多学生发现在大学学习比在学校更难。为什么会这样？有什么办法可以解决这个问题？

en: In today’ s world, people spend a lot of money on appearance because they want to look younger. Why does this happen? Do you think this is a positive or negative development?
zh: 在当今世界，人们花很多钱在外表上，因为他们想看起来更年轻。为什么会出现这种情况？你认为这是一个积极的还是消极的发展？

views.claim_zh: 技术发展，医美

en: The values that we learn from our parents and family have a greater influence on our future success than any knowledge and skills we learn at school. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 我们从父母和家人那里学到的价值观比我们在学校学到的任何知识和技能对我们未来的成功有更大的影响。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: People today can shop, work and communicate with others via the Internet instead of face to face communication. Is it a positive or negative development?
zh: 今天的人们可以通过互联网购物、工作和与他人交流，而不是面对面的交流。这是一种积极还是消极的发展？

en: Some people believe that studying at university or college is the best route to a successful career, while others believe that it is better to get a job straight after school and develop work experience. Discuss both views and give your opinion.
zh: 有些人认为在大学或学院学习是通往成功职业生涯的最佳途径，而另一些人则认为最好是毕业后直接找工作，积累工作经验。讨论两种观点并给出你的观点。

en: In some countries, celebrities complain about reports of their private lives. Some people say that they should accept it as part of their fame. Do you agree or disagree?
zh: 在一些国家，名人抱怨对他们私生活的报道。有些人说他们应该接受这是他们成名的一部分。你同意还是不同意？

en: Long-distance flight consumes the amount of fuel that a car uses in many years and pollutes the air. Some people think that we should discourage non-essential flights, such as tourist travel, rather than the use of cars. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 长途飞行消耗了一辆汽车多年使用的燃料，并污染了空气。有些人认为我们应该阻止非必要的飞行，比如旅游旅行，而不是使用汽车。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: Art classes, like painting and drawing are as important as other subjects, so they should be made compulsory in high school. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 美术课，像绘画和素描和其他科目一样重要，所以它们应该成为高中的必修课。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

views.claim_zh:
美术课，像绘画和素描和其他科目一样重要 原因-观点

怼原因：美术课程没有其他课程重要 -- 对于绝大部分大学生，影响他们升学的课程主要取决于其他主课
怼关系：美术课成为高中的必修课和是否和其他课程一样重要无关

en: More and more people today want to get thing instantly(goods, service, news). Why is this? Is this expectation to get what they want instantly a positive or negative development?
zh: 现在越来越多的人想要立即得到东西（商品、服务、新闻）。这是为什么呢？这种立即得到自己想要的东西的期望是积极的还是消极的发展？

en: Some people claim that it is acceptable to use animals in any way for the benefit of human beings, while others argue that it is wrong to use animals for human purposes. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 一些人声称，为了人类的利益而以任何方式使用动物都是可以接受的，而另一些人则认为，为了人类的目的而使用动物是错误的。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: An increasing number of people are changing their careers. What are the reasons? Is it a positive or negative development for society as a whole?
zh: 越来越多的人正在改变他们的职业。原因是什么？对整个社会来说，这是一个积极的还是消极的发展？

en: Some people say the fashion industry is bad for the environment, as it encourages the consumers to buy new clothes all the time. Do you agree or disagree？
zh: 有人说时尚业对环境有害，因为它鼓励消费者总是买新衣服。你同意还是不同意？

en: Some people think that there could be more benefits to society if more people studied business than history. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 有些人认为，如果更多的人学习商业而不是历史，对社会会有更多的好处。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: Some people think rapid population growth in cities only benefits people who live there while others believe that there are disadvantages. Discuss both these views and give your own opinion.
zh: 一些人认为城市人口的快速增长只对居住在那里的人有利，而另一些人则认为这是不利的。讨论这两种观点，并给出你的观点。

en: The best way to protect the environment is to use local resources (e.g. food, building materials) rather than to transport resources from other places. To what extent do you agree or disagree with this idea?
zh: 保护环境的最好方法是使用当地资源（如食物、建筑材料），而不是从其他地方运输资源。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: Some people think that the modern communication technology is having a negative effect on a social relationship. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 一些人认为现代通讯技术正在对社会关系产生负面影响。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这种观点？

en: In more and more countries, people choose to give money on special occasions rather than giving gifts chosen personally. Why might this be the case? Is it a positive or negative development?
zh: 在越来越多的国家，人们选择在特殊场合给钱，而不是送自己选择的礼物。为什么会出现这种情况呢？这是积极的还是消极的发展？

en: Many people’s choice of future jobs is based on salaries. Do the advantages outweigh the disadvantages?
zh: 许多人选择未来的工作是基于薪水。利大于弊吗？

en: Some students dislike learning maths. What are the reasons and what are the solutions to make students enjoy math learning?
zh: 有些学生不喜欢学数学。原因是什么，有什么解决办法让学生喜欢数学学习？

en: Old buildings are of historical importance and should be preserved in cities and countrysides. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 老建筑具有重要的历史意义，应该在城市和农村得到保护。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: Some people think math is important for school children; however, others believe that other subjects are also important. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 有些人认为数学对学龄儿童很重要；然而，也有人认为其他科目也很重要。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: If you want to be successful at work, you should have high-level computer skills. Do you agree or disagree?
zh: 如果你想在工作上取得成功，你应该有高水平的计算机技能。你同意还是不同意？

en: In many parts of the world, children are given more freedom than in the past. Is this a positive or negative development?
zh: 在世界上的许多地方，孩子们比过去获得了更多的自由。这是一个积极的还是消极的发展？

en: Some people believe teachers should teach students to judge what is right or wrong and to behave well. Others say teachers should only teach students academic subjects. Discuss both views and give your opinion.
zh: 有些人认为老师应该教学生判断什么是对或错，并表现良好。另一些人则认为老师应该只教学生学术科目。讨论两种观点并给出你的观点。

en: Everyone should become a vegetarian because they do not need to eat meat to have a healthy diet. Do you agree or disagree?
zh: 每个人都应该成为素食主义者，因为他们不需要吃肉来保持健康的饮食。你是否同意？

en: The media should include more stories which report good news. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 媒体应该多报道一些好消息。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: Some people think that films and video games containing violence have negative effects on people and should be banned. Others think that they are just relaxation sources. Discuss both sides and give your own opinion.
zh: 一些人认为含有暴力的电影和电子游戏对人们有负面影响，应该被禁止。另一些人认为它们只是放松的来源。讨论双方并给出你自己的观点。
