en: In some countries, the number of people visiting art galleries is declining. What are the reasons for this? How can we solve the problem?
zh: 在一些国家，参观美术馆的人数正在下降。这是什么原因呢？我们如何解决这个问题？

en: Some people think the newly built houses should be the same as the old houses in local areas. Others argue that local authorities should allow people to build houses in their own style. Discuss both views and give your opinion.
zh: 一些人认为新建的房子应该和当地的老房子一样。另一些人认为地方当局应该允许人们建造自己风格的房子。讨论两种观点并给出你的观点。

en: An increasing number of developing countries are expanding their tourist industry. Why do you think it is the case? Do you think it is a positive or negative development?
zh: 越来越多的发展中国家正在发展他们的旅游业。你认为为什么会这样？你认为这是一个积极的还是消极的发展？

en: Some people think technology mostly benefits our lives, while others believe it brings more disadvantages. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 一些人认为科技主要给我们的生活带来好处，而另一些人则认为它带来了更多的缺点。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: Some people think that improving people's standard of living is always more important than protecting wild birds and animals. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 一些人认为提高人们的生活水平总是比保护野生鸟类和动物更重要。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: In many places, people's lifestyles are changing rapidly, and this affects family relationships. Do the advantages of this trend outweigh the disadvantages?
zh: 在许多地方，人们的生活方式正在迅速变化，这影响了家庭关系。这种趋势的利大于弊吗？

en: The government should spend money on children taking part in sports and art activities in schools, rather than sponsoring professional sports and art events for the public. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 政府应该把钱花在孩子们参加学校的体育和艺术活动上，而不是为公众赞助专业的体育和艺术活动。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这个观点？

en: There are more and more older workers working in companies. Does this trend have more advantages or disadvantages for a company?
zh: 有越来越多的老员工在公司工作。这种趋势对公司是有利还是不利？

en: Nowadays, people spend a great deal of time sitting, leading to health problems. Why does this happen? What are the best ways to encourage people to sit less?
zh: 现在，人们花大量的时间坐着，导致健康问题。为什么会出现这种情况呢？鼓励人们少坐的最好方法是什么？

en: Now men and women's clothing styles are similar. Why is this happening? ls it a positive or negative development?
zh: 现在男人和女人的穿衣风格差不多。为什么会出现这种情况？这是积极的还是消极的发展？

en: The best way to learn a culture is to learn its language. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 学习一种文化的最好方法是学习它的语言。你在多大程度上同意或不同意这种观点？

en: Although modern technology has made international communication very easy, many business people still travel long distances for business meetings. Do the benefits of face-to-face meetings outweigh the disadvantages?
zh: 尽管现代科技使国际交流变得非常容易，但许多商务人士仍然长途跋涉参加商务会议。面对面会议的利大于弊吗？

en: Some people think governments should spend money to look for life on other planets, while others think it is a waste of money because there are many unsolved problems on earth.  Discuss both views and give your opinion.
zh: 一些人认为政府应该花钱去寻找其他星球上的生命，而另一些人则认为这是浪费钱，因为地球上还有许多未解决的问题。讨论两种观点并给出你的观点。

en: Some people think governments should provide funds for performing art training courses, while others think that it is the responsibility of businesses and students’ families. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 一些人认为政府应该为表演艺术培训课程提供资金，而另一些人则认为这是企业和学生家庭的责任。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: Certain laws have little effect now because it is difficult for the police to enforce them. Why is that? How can this problem be solved?
zh: 某些法律现在几乎没有效果，因为警察很难执行它们。这是为什么呢？这个问题怎么解决？

en: Some people think only the best students should be rewarded, while others think we should reward students who show improvements. Discuss both these views and give your own opinion.
zh: 一些人认为只有最好的学生才应该得到奖励，而另一些人则认为我们应该奖励那些表现出进步的学生。讨论这两种观点，并给出你自己的观点。

en: Some people think that it is better to use scientific techniques to grow food, while others think that we should grow food naturally. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 有些人认为用科学技术种植食物更好，而另一些人则认为我们应该自然种植食物。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: Some people think that the ability to compete with others for a successful career is more important. Others believe that the ability to work with others as a team is more important. Discuss both these views and give your own opinion.
zh: 有些人认为与他人竞争成功事业的能力更重要。另一些人则认为与他人合作的能力更重要。讨论这两种观点，并给出你自己的观点。

en: Some people think that it is more effective for students to study in a group while others believe that it is better for them to study alone. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 有些人认为学生在小组中学习更有效，而另一些人则认为他们单独学习更好。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: Companies introduce new products regularly and encourage consumers to replace their products with these new models. Do you think it is a positive or negative development?
zh: 公司定期推出新产品，并鼓励消费者用这些新型号替换他们的产品。你认为这是一个积极的还是消极的发展？

en: Today more and more people like to go to untouched and unexplored natural places to travel. What are the advantages and disadvantages for these tourists and the countries?
zh: 今天，越来越多的人喜欢去未被触及和未被探索的自然地方旅行。对这些游客和国家有什么好处和坏处？

en: In order to be successful in sport, some people think it is essential to have a good coach. Others say that natural ability is more important. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
zh: 为了在体育运动中取得成功，一些人认为有一个好的教练是必不可少的。另一些人则认为天生的能力更重要。讨论两种观点并给出你自己的观点。

en: Some people think the best way to improve road safety is to increase the minimum legal age for driving cars and motorcycles. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 一些人认为提高道路安全的最好方法是提高驾驶汽车和摩托车的最低法定年龄。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？

en: Nowadays, some consumers are less influenced by advertising than in the past. What are the reasons? Is it a positive or negative development?
zh: 现在，一些消费者不像过去那样受广告的影响了。原因是什么？这是积极的还是消极的发展？

en: Government should protect culture. Therefore, some people believe that new buildings should be built in traditional styles. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
zh: 政府应该保护文化。因此，一些人认为新建筑应该按照传统风格建造。你在多大程度上同意或不同意？
